https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7

API Documentation

API Endpoint
https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7

AVAILABLE ONLY IN DEV MODE

Platinumlist API ¶

Base url: https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7

Changes from previous version ¶

v.7 changelog ¶

Changes inside current version:

  • Headers

    • add new header Api-Key

  • Scopes

    • add new scope show.event
    • add new scope affiliate.show.event

  • Endpoint Events

    • add new filter is_online
    • add new parameter is_online - bool
    • add new parameter rating - int
    • add new parameter references.artist - array[number]|null
    • add new include price
    • add new include score
    • add new filter nearby_city

  • Endpoint Event shows

    • add new filter is_online
    • add new parameter is_online - bool

  • Endpoint Event types

    • add new filter is_online
    • add new parameter is_online - bool

  • Endpoint Event tickets

    • add new parameter online_url - string|null
    • add new parameter online_instructions - string|null

  • Endpoint Orders

    • add new parameter user_id - number|array[number]|null
    • add new parameter event_id - number|array[number]|null

  • Add new endpoint

    • Reporting order
    • Artists

  • Endpoints Event ticket, Event season ticket, Event voucher

    • add ident param to the Event ticket batch modify tickets, Event season ticket batch modify season tickets and Event voucher batch modify vouchers

  • Add new endpoint

    • Reporting ticket

  • Add new endpoint

    • Promo Medias

  • Add new endpoint

    • Organiser tickets
    • Organiser orders

  • Endpoint Events

    • add new parameter price_scope - string|null
    • add description for header parameter Api-Currency

full changelog

Use API for validating sold tickets or vouchers ¶

For any request you must use access token. Create it first (See example request Regular or Facebook Regular).

Access token must grand access to scope use.event-tickets or use.event-vouchers

Find necessary event show whose tickets or vouchers you need to validate.

Retrieve related to event show tickets or vouchers.

Validate or devalidate tickets or vouchers using PATCH request method

Update collection agent stats about scanning, validating and revalidating actions.

Use API for perform partner sale ¶

For any request you must use access token. Create it first using user account login as credential and password from agent account as password parameter (See example request Partner).

Access token must grand access to scope partner-sale.event-tickets or partner-sale.event-vouchers

Find necessary event show whose tickets or vouchers you want to sale.

Any ticket or voucher types of event show grouped by event offers. See what the offers available for sale and it’s contents. Some offers may be hidden because restricted by promo code. Use parameter promo_code to validate promo code and include hidden offers related to given promo code to the response offer list.

Event offer may be one of type:

  • ticket - offer contain one ticket

  • table - offer contains few tickets from one table

  • voucher - offer contain one voucher

  • package - offer contains few tickets or vouchers

Every event show has one related to it basket so you no need to create it manually. Content of basket is basket items. For buying event offer you need add it to basket as basket item using event_offer.id and promo_code if offer is hidden. Not empty basket has final lifetime. You can delete basket item or empty whole basket

Some restriction exists about basket content. Available combination of offers within basket:

  • 1+ ticket offers from same map zone and 0+ voucher offers

  • 1+ table offers from same map zone and 0+ voucher offers

  • 1+ voucher offers

  • 1+ package same offers and 0+ voucher offers

When you add new offer to basket existing basket items removed automatically if failed rules described above.

See what the services available for show. Services prices maybe static or depend on basket content.

If basket ready to be purchased - purchase it. Also you can provide one or more event_service.id and must provide correct amount to purchase for additional check with basket amount. After purchase basket you retrieve order.id which may be used to retrieve info about order and it’s tickets and vouchers. If order.is_delayed_delivery is true you must to show to customer order.ticket_waiting_text instead of tickets or vouchers which it bought.

Simple script example ¶

<?php

function makeApiCall($resource, $method, $params, $accessToken, $expectedHttpCode) {
    $curlOptions = [
        CURLOPT_HEADER => false,
        CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
        CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
            'Content-Type: application/json',
        ],
        CURLOPT_URL => 'https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7' . $resource,
        CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $method,
    ];

    if (!empty($accessToken)) {
        $curlOptions[CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER][] = 'Authorization: Bearer ' . $accessToken;
    }

    if ($method == 'GET') {
        $curlOptions[CURLOPT_URL] .= '?' . http_build_query($params);
    } else {
        $curlOptions[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = json_encode($params);
    }

    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt_array($ch, $curlOptions);
    $response = curl_exec($ch);

    if (curl_errno($ch)) {
        throw new Exception('Curl error: ' . curl_error($ch));
    }

    $responseData = json_decode($response, true);

    if (curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE) != $expectedHttpCode) {
        throw new Exception($responseData['error']['message'], $responseData['error']['code']);
    }

    curl_close($ch);

    return $responseData;
}

try {
    // Create access token
    echo "Creating access token - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        '/access-token',
        'POST',
        [
            'credential' => '{PARTNER AGENT LOGIN}', // TODO: replace with your partner agent login
            'password' => '{PARTNER AGENT PASSWORD}', // TODO: replace with your partner agent password
            'is_partner_login' => true,
        ],
        null,
        201
    );

    $accessToken = $response['data']['access_token'];
    echo "DONE\n";

    // Find Dubai city
    echo "Find city Dubai - ";
    $response = makeApiCall('/cities', 'GET', ['search' => 'Dubai'], $accessToken, 200);

    if (count($response['data']) == 0) {
        echo "not found\n";
        exit;
    }
    $dubaiCityId = $response['data'][0]['id'];
    echo "DONE. ID: {$dubaiCityId}\n";

    // Find test event show in dubai by name
    echo "Find test event show - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        '/event-shows',
        'GET',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.event-tickets',
            'event.search' => 'Swanlake API test',
            'city.id' => $dubaiCityId,
            'start_from' => time(),
            'has_tickets' => 1,
            'include' => 'event,venue',
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    if (count($response['data']) == 0) {
        echo "not found\n";
        exit;
    }
    // $response['data'][0]['event'] - event info
    // $response['data'][0]['venue'] - venue info
    $idEventShow = $response['data'][0]['id'];
    echo "DONE. ID: {$idEventShow}\n";

    // Find map zones from event show
    echo "Find event map zones from event show - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        "/event-shows/{$idEventShow}/map-zones",
        'GET',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.event-tickets',
            'status' => 'open',
            'include' => 'event_ticket_types',
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    if (count($response['data']) == 0) {
        echo "not found\n";
        exit;
    }
    echo "DONE. Found: {$response['meta']['pagination']['total']}\n";

    // Find offers from event show
    echo "Find offers from event show - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        "/event-shows/{$idEventShow}/offers",
        'GET',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.event-tickets',
            'is_available' => 1,
            'sort' => 'price',
            'include' => 'event_ticket_types,event_voucher_types',
            //'event_map_zone.id' => ... Get only offers for specific map zone
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    if (count($response['data']) == 0) {
        echo "not found\n";
        exit;
    }
    // $response['data'][0]['event_ticket_types'], $response['data'][0]['event_voucher_types'] - tickets and vouchers in offer
    $idEventOffer = $response['data'][0]['id'];
    echo "DONE. Found: " . count($response['data']) . ". First ID: {$idEventOffer}\n";

    // Add offer to basket
    echo "Add offer to basket - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        "/baskets/{$idEventShow}/items",
        'POST',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.event-tickets',
            'data' => [
                'event_offer.id' => $idEventOffer,
            ],
        ],
        $accessToken,
        201
    );
    echo "DONE\n";

    // Get basket
    echo "Get basket - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        "/baskets/{$idEventShow}",
        'GET',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.event-tickets',
            'include' => 'basket_items',
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    $amount = $response['data']['amount'];
    echo "DONE. Items in basket: " . count($response['data']['basket_items']) . ". Amount: {$amount} {$response['data']['currency']}\n";

    // Find UAE country for user's nationality
    echo "Find country UAE for user's nationality - ";
    $response = makeApiCall('/countries', 'GET', ['search' => 'United Arab Emirates'], $accessToken, 200);
    if (count($response['data']) == 0) {
        echo "not found\n";
        exit;
    }
    $uaeCountryId = $response['data'][0]['id'];
    echo "DONE. ID: {$uaeCountryId}\n";

    // Purchase basket
    echo "Purchase basket - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        "/baskets/{$idEventShow}",
        'PATCH',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.event-tickets',
            'operation' => 'purchase',
            'amount' => $amount,
            'user' => [
                'name' => 'John Smith',
                'email' => 'foo@example.com',
                'phone' => '+971501234567',
                'birthday' => '1988-02-15',
                'gender' => 'm',
                'nationality.id' => $uaeCountryId,
                'city.id' => $dubaiCityId,
            ]
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    if ($response['meta']['status'] !== 'success') {
        echo "not found\n";
        exit;
    }
    $idOrder = $response['meta']['order.id'];
    echo "DONE. Purchased order ID: {$idOrder}\n";

    // Retrieve information about purchase
    echo "Retrieve information about purchase - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        "/orders/{$idOrder}",
        'GET',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.event-tickets',
            'include' => 'event_tickets,event_tickets.seating_position,event_tickets.event_ticket_type,event_tickets.event_ticket_type.event_map_zone,event_vouchers,event_vouchers.event_voucher_type',
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    echo "DONE.\n";
    echo "  Purchased tickets: " . count($response['data']['event_tickets']['data']) . "\n";
    foreach ($response['data']['event_tickets']['data'] as $eventTicket) {
        echo "    {$eventTicket['event_ticket_type']['data']['event_map_zone']['data']['name']} {$eventTicket['event_ticket_type']['data']['name']}";
        if (!$eventTicket['event_ticket_type']['data']['event_map_zone']['data']['is_general_admission']) {
            echo " {$eventTicket['seating_position']['data']['row']} {$eventTicket['seating_position']['data']['place']}";
        }
        echo " {$eventTicket['ident']}\n";
    }
    echo "  Purchased vouchers: " . count($response['data']['event_vouchers']['data']) . "\n";
    foreach ($response['data']['event_vouchers']['data'] as $eventVoucher) {
        echo "    {$eventVoucher['event_voucher_type']['data']['name']} {$eventVoucher['ident']}";
    }
} catch (Exception $ex) {
    echo $ex->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}

Receive payment example ¶

<?php

function makeApiCall($resource, $method, $params, $accessToken, $expectedHttpCode) {
    $curlOptions = [
        CURLOPT_HEADER => false,
        CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
        CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
            'Content-Type: application/json',
        ],
        CURLOPT_URL => 'https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7' . $resource,
        CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $method,
    ];

    if (!empty($accessToken)) {
        $curlOptions[CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER][] = 'Authorization: Bearer ' . $accessToken;
    }

    if ($method == 'GET') {
        $curlOptions[CURLOPT_URL] .= '?' . http_build_query($params);
    } else {
        $curlOptions[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = json_encode($params);
    }

    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt_array($ch, $curlOptions);
    $response = curl_exec($ch);

    if (curl_errno($ch)) {
        throw new Exception('Curl error: ' . curl_error($ch));
    }

    $responseData = json_decode($response, true);

    if (curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE) != $expectedHttpCode) {
        throw new Exception($responseData['error']['message'], $responseData['error']['code']);
    }

    curl_close($ch);

    return $responseData;
}

try {
    // Create access token
    echo "Creating access token - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        '/access-token',
        'POST',
        [
            'credential' => '{PARTNER AGENT LOGIN}', // TODO: replace with your partner agent login
            'password' => '{PARTNER AGENT PASSWORD}', // TODO: replace with your partner agent password
            'is_partner_login' => true,
        ],
        null,
        201
    );

    $accessToken = $response['data']['access_token'];
    echo "DONE\n";

    // Get order on hold
    echo "Get order on hold - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        '/orders/{id}', // TODO: replace {id} with correct order.id
        'GET',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.receive-payments',
            'include' => 'event_tickets,event_vouchers,order_services,fee'
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    $orderInfo = $response;
    echo "DONE\n";
    
    if ($orderInfo['data']['status'] != 'pending payment') {
      throw new Exception('Invalid order status');
    }

    // Patch order
    echo "Patch order - ";
    $patchResponse = makeApiCall(
        "/orders/{$orderInfo['data']['id']}",
        'PATCH',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.receive-payments',
            'operation' => 'pay',
            'amount' => $orderInfo['data']['amount'],
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    echo "DONE\n";
    
    if ($patchResponse['meta']['status'] != 'success') {
      throw new Exception('Patch order error');
    }
    
    // Retrieve information about purchase
    echo "Retrieve information about purchase - ";
    $response = makeApiCall(
        "/orders/{$patchResponse['data']['id']}",
        'GET',
        [
            'scope' => 'partner-sale.receive-payments',
            'include' => 'event_tickets,event_tickets.seating_position,event_tickets.event_ticket_type,event_tickets.event_ticket_type.event_map_zone,event_vouchers,event_vouchers.event_voucher_type',
        ],
        $accessToken,
        200
    );
    echo "DONE.\n";
    
    echo "  Purchased tickets: " . count($response['data']['event_tickets']['data']) . "\n";
    foreach ($response['data']['event_tickets']['data'] as $eventTicket) {
        echo "    {$eventTicket['event_ticket_type']['data']['event_map_zone']['data']['name']} {$eventTicket['event_ticket_type']['data']['name']}";
        if (!$eventTicket['event_ticket_type']['data']['event_map_zone']['data']['is_general_admission']) {
            echo " {$eventTicket['seating_position']['data']['row']} {$eventTicket['seating_position']['data']['place']}";
        }
        echo " {$eventTicket['ident']}\n";
    }
    echo "  Purchased vouchers: " . count($response['data']['event_vouchers']['data']) . "\n";
    foreach ($response['data']['event_vouchers']['data'] as $eventVoucher) {
        echo "    {$eventVoucher['event_voucher_type']['data']['name']} {$eventVoucher['ident']}";
    }
    
} catch (Exception $ex) {
        echo $ex->getMessage();
        echo "\n";
}

HTTP status code summary ¶

Code Description
200 OK. Everything worked as expected.
201 OK. Resource created
204 OK. No content
400 Bad Request. Invalid parameters, invalid request method etc.
403 Bad Request. Permissions denied
404 Bad Request. Resource not found
50x Server Errors

Error codes ¶

General errors ¶

Code Description
100 Internal error (something’s broken, database request failed etc.)
101 Invalid API version
102 Invalid access token
103 Resource not found (basically, 404)
104 Record not found in the database
105 Invalid request parameters
106 Invalid request method
107 Invalid resource’s status for current operation
300 Resource data validation failed

Authentication ¶

Code Description
200 Invalid authentication credential
201 Invalid password
202 User account closed
203 User account blocked
204 Access forbidden (no access, user is banned etc)
207 General authentication error
208 Credential/password combination are used with more than one partner agent account
209 Invalid facebook access token
210 Invalid code provided
211 Verification code expired.
212 Verification request corrupted. Please try again.
213 Sms validation is temporary not available. Please contact to support.

Resource data validation error example ¶

{
    "error": {
        "message": "Resource data validation failed",
        "code": 300,
        "invalid_fields": {
            "email": {
                "callbackValue": "This email is already registered"
            },
            "phone": {
                "invalidNumber": "'+9715234567' is not a valid phone number"
            },
            "birthday": {
                "tooYoung": "Minimum allowed age is 18 years."
            },
            "gender": {
                "isEmpty": "Field is required"
            }
        }
    }

Scopes ¶

Access Token ¶

Scope Description
use.event-tickets Grants access to events, shows, tickets, some tickets patching operations
use.event-vouchers Grants access to events, shows, vouchers, some vouchers patching operations
use.event-season-tickets Grants access to events, shows, season tickets, some season tickets patching operations
collection-agent-stats.events Grand access to collection agent stats view and increase
partner-sale.event-tickets Grant access to event, shows, offers, baskets
partner-sale.event-vouchers Grant access to event, shows, offers, baskets
partner-sale.event-season-tickets Grant access to event, shows, offers
partner-sale.receive-payments Grant access to modify order
show.events Grants access to events

Api-Key ¶

Scope Description
show.events Grants access to events
affiliate.show.events Grants access to events, which visible on website

Global params ¶

HTTP available headers ¶

Name Values
Content-Type application/json or multipart/form-data
Authorization Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}
Api-Key {API KEY}. Please contact support to get personal api-key
Content-Language ar;q=1. Available languages: ar, vi and en. By default en.
Api-Currency Set currency for offer minimal price. Optional parameter, available for Event endpoint.

To access the API, you need to use either Authorization or Api-Key header.

Sorting ¶

Parameter sort can be used to describe sorting rules.

By default each rule has ascending sort order. Use - before field for descending sort order.

For complex sort use list of comma separated fields.

Examples:

  • ?sort=-rating - retrieves a list of events in descending order of rating

  • ?sort=-rating,start - retrieves a list of events in descending order of rating. Within a specific rating, older events are ordered first

Pagination ¶

When working with a large data set it obviously makes sense to offer pagination options to the endpoint, otherwise that data can get very slow.

Use parameters page and per_page to return part of resultset.

By default page=1, per_page=10. Maximum value for per_page is 100. There was increased default limit value per_page to 100 and maximum limit value per_page to 10000 for methods: Event show’s ticket list, Event show’s voucher list and Event show’s season ticket list

For navigating by paginator see pagination on meta response

{
    "data": [],
    "meta": {
        "pagination": {
            "total": 50,
            "count": 10,
            "per_page": 10,
            "current_page": 2,
            "total_pages": 6,
            "links": {
                "previous": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events?scope=use.event-tickets&page=1",
                "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events?scope=use.event-tickets&page=3"
            }
        }
    }
}

Include ¶

By default resource in response contain only main data but some resource has additional data like references ids and references resources or resource collection.

To include additional data to resource in use parameter include.

Use , to specify few includes.

Use . to specify nested includes. Parent resource of nested includes also included in result. So ?include=city.country equal to ?include=city,city.country. Allowed maximum 3 nesting level.

Examples:

  • ?include=references - include resource references

  • ?include=references,city - include resource references and related resource city

  • ?include=references,city.country - include resource references, related resource city and related (to city) resource country

Override HTTP Request Method ¶

Usage cases ¶

Sometimes you need to pass a lot of parameters into query for GET HTTP Request. But query string has limit.

In this case, you can change HTTP Request Method to POST, pass all parameters into request body, like as other POST requests and add “/index” parameter into query string.

Example: ¶

You have request link:

https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/tickets?scope=use.event-tickets&include=references%2Corder%2Corder.user%2Cseating_position

After this changes, its should look like this :

https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/tickets/index

and other parameters should be in the request’s body.

Try User ¶

If you are planning to realize two-step authorization flow you can check that user exists by sending user`s credential to try user endpoint.

User info ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/try-user?credential
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": []
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {}
  }
}

User info
GET/try-user?{credential}

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/try-user?credential=john@doe.com"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "name":"John Doe",
    "avatarBig": {
      "src":"https:\/\/platinumlist.net\/upload\/user\/avatar\/1-321654687432_big.jpg",
      "width":400,
      "height":400
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
credential
string (required) 

user email or login

Access token ¶

Check access token ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token
RequestsExample
Headers
Authorization: Bearer 374091247e0ca2af539e39c3d9b2e020
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "374091247e0ca2af539e39c3d9b2e020",
    "expires": 1445507578,
    "scopes": [
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-ticket",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events"
    ]
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "token_type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "Bearer"
          ]
        },
        "access_token": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "expires": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp when token expiry"
        },
        "scopes": {
          "type": "array",
          "description": "list of available scopes"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "token_type",
        "access_token",
        "expires",
        "scopes"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Check access token
GET/access-token

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "{ACCESS TOKEN}",
    "expires": 1490751104,
    "scopes": [
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-tickets",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events",
      "partner-sale.event-tickets",
      "partner-sale.event-vouchers"
    ]
  }
}

Create access token ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token
RequestsRegularRegular first stepRegular second stepFacebook RegularPartner
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "credential": "login",
  "password": "super secret"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "credential": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "login or email"
    },
    "password": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "password"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "credential",
    "password"
  ]
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "374091247e0ca2af539e39c3d9b2e020",
    "expires": 1445507578,
    "scopes": [
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-ticket",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events"
    ]
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "token_type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "Bearer"
          ]
        },
        "access_token": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "expires": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp when token expiry"
        },
        "scopes": {
          "type": "array",
          "description": "list of available scopes"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "token_type",
        "access_token",
        "expires",
        "scopes"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "credential": "login",
  "password": "super super secret",
  "is_two_factor_verification": true
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "credential": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "login or email"
    },
    "password": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "password"
    },
    "is_two_factor_verification": {
      "type": "boolean"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "credential",
    "password",
    "is_two_factor_verification"
  ]
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "hash": "ee5b6bcafdaeb8499d903948c00f10d7",
    "phone_number": "+5411****5678"
  }
}

Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "credential": "login",
  "password": "super super secret",
  "is_two_factor_verification": true,
  "verification": "validate",
  "hash": "ee5b6bcafdaeb8499d903948c00f10d7",
  "code": 358
}

  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "credential": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "login or email"
    },
    "password": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "password"

      "type": "boolean"

Create access token
POST/access-token

Regular login ¶

Body parameters:

  • credential string (required) - login or email

  • password string (required) - user password

  • is_partner_login boolean (required) - must be false

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "credential": "{USER LOGIN OR EMAIL}",
  "password": "{USER PASSWORD}",
  "is_partner_login": false
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "{ACCESS TOKEN}",
    "expires": 1490751104,
    "scopes": [
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-tickets",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events",
    ]
  }
}

Regular login with two factor verification ¶

Body parameters:

  • credential string (required) - login or email

  • password string (required) - user password

  • is_two_factor_verification boolean (required) - must be true

  • hash string (required) - verification hash

  • verification string (required) - possible values validate or resend. Meaning to validate passed verification code or resend new.

  • code number (required) - verification code

First step ¶

Add param is_two_factor_verification to start use two factor verification.

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "credential": "{USER LOGIN OR EMAIL}",
  "password": "{USER PASSWORD}",
  "is_partner_login": false,
  "is_two_factor_verification": true
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "hash": "ee5b6bcafdaeb8499d903948c00f10d7",
        "phone_number": "+5411****5678"
    }
}

Second step ¶

For verification received code you must set verification to validate and provide correct hash value from the previous response.

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "credential": "{USER LOGIN OR EMAIL}",
  "password": "{USER PASSWORD}",
  "is_partner_login": false,
  "is_two_factor_verification": true,
  "hash": "{HASH}",
  "code": "{RECEIVED CODE}",
  "verification": "validate",
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "{ACCESS TOKEN}",
    "expires": 1490751104,
    "scopes": [
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-tickets",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events",
    ]
  }
}

Resend code step ¶

If user did not receive the message, you have ability to resend code again. Set verification to resend and provide correct hash value from previous response.

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "credential": "{USER LOGIN OR EMAIL}",
  "password": "{USER PASSWORD}",
  "is_partner_login": false,
  "is_two_factor_verification": true,
  "hash": "{HASH}",
  "verification": "resend",
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "hash": "ee5b6bcafdaeb8499d903948c00f10d7",
        "phone_number": "+5411****5678"
    }
}

Regular login with facebook ¶

Body parameters:

  • fb_access_token string (required) - access_token obtained from facebook

  • is_partner_login boolean (required) - must be false

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "fb_access_token": "{FB ACCESS TOKEN}",
  "is_partner_login": false
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "{ACCESS TOKEN}",
    "expires": 1490751104,
    "scopes": [
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-tickets",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events",
    ]
  }
}

Regular login with google ¶

Body parameters:

  • google_id_token string (required) - id_token obtained from google

  • is_partner_login boolean (required) - must be false

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "google_id_token": "{ID TOKEN}",
  "is_partner_login": false
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "{ACCESS TOKEN}",
    "expires": 1490751104,
    "scopes": [
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-tickets",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events",
    ]
  }
}

Partner login ¶

Body parameters:

  • credential string (required) - login

  • password string (required) - agent password

  • is_partner_login boolean (required) - must be true

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "credential": "{PARTNER AGENT LOGIN}",
  "password": "{PARTNER AGENT PASSWORD}",
  "is_partner_login": true
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "access_token": "{ACCESS TOKEN}",
    "expires": 1490751104,
    "scopes": [
      "use.event-tickets",
      "use.event-vouchers",
      "print.badges",
      "use.event-season-tickets",
      "collection-agent-stats.events",
      "partner-sale.event-tickets",
      "partner-sale.event-vouchers",
      "partner-sale.event-season-tickets"
    ]
  }
}

Delete access token ¶

DELETE https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer 374091247e0ca2af539e39c3d9b2e020
Responses204
Headers
Content-Type: application/json

Delete access token
DELETE/access-token

Example ¶

Request

curl -X DELETE \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/access-token"

Artist ¶

Artist list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/artists?search
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Name",
      "url": "https://platinumlist.net/artist/1/name"
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Artist list
GET/artists?{search}

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \ 
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/artists"

Response

{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 35,
            "name": "Name Artist",
            "url": "https://platinumlist.lc/artist/35/name-artist"
        },
        {
            "id": 33,
            "name": "Artist Name",
            "url": "https://platinumlist.lc/artist/33/artist-name"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Artist",
            "url": "https://platinumlist.lc/artist/1/artist"
        },
        {
            "id": 34,
            "name": "Name",
            "url": "https://platinumlist.lc/artist/34/name"
        }
    ],
    "meta": {
        "pagination": {
            "total": 48,
            "count": 10,
            "per_page": 10,
            "current_page": 1,
            "total_pages": 5,
            "links": {
                "next": "https://api.platinumlist.lc/v/7/artists?page=2"
            }
        }
    }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
search
string (optional) 

query string to search by artist name

Artist ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/artists/id
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Name",
    "url": "https://platinumlist.net/artist/1/name"
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of artist"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name of artist"
        },
        "url": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "url of the artist on the Platinumlist website"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "url"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Artist
GET/artists/{id}

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \ 
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/artists/35"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 35,
        "name": "Name Artist",
        "url": "https://platinumlist.lc/artist/35/name-artist"
    }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

artist id

Event ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • show.events

  • affiliate.show.events

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_types

  • white_label

  • promo_group

  • event_shows

  • price

  • score

  • venues

Event list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events?scope&search&has_tickets&start_from&start_to&end_from&end_to&city.id&event_type.id&event_type_recursive&is_attraction&nearby_city.id
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Swanlake",
      "start": 1445507578,
      "end": 1445518419,
      "image_big": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
        "width": 1,
        "height": 1
      },
      "image_medium": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
        "width": 1,
        "height": 1
      },
      "image_small": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
        "width": 1,
        "height": 1
      },
      "image_full": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
        "width": 1,
        "height": 1
      },
      "is_extra_security_mode_on": false,
      "has_tickets": true,
      "has_sales_started": true,
      "description": "Lorem ipsum sit dolores...",
      "url": "https://dubai.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/event_id/event_name",
      "white_label_url": "https://swanlake.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/11634/swanlake-test-event/ticket-office",
      "scanning_mode": true,
      "vat": 0,
      "is_attraction": true,
      "status": "approved",
      "rating": 12,
      "is_online": false
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event list
GET/events?{scope,search,has_tickets,start_from,start_to,end_from,end_to,city.id,event_type.id,event_type_recursive,is_attraction,nearby_city.id}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

  • show.events

  • affiliate.show.events

Available sorts:

  • start - default

  • end

  • rating - higher rating value - more popular event. For retrieving popular events on top specify -rating sort

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=price,score,venues"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 11634,
      "name": "Swanlake API test (TEST EVENT, DO NOT SELL TICKETS)",
      "start": 1510419600,
      "end": 1512590340,
      "vat": 0,
      "image_big": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-full.png",

    "pagination": {

    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

search
string (optional) 

query string to search event by name

has_tickets
string (optional) 

return only events with tickets

start_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering event by date start

start_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering event by date start

end_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering event by date end

end_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering event by date end

city.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter event by city

nearby_city.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter event by nearby city

event_type.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter event by event type

event_type_recursive
boolean (optional) Default: false 

if it’s set to true, event will be searched also under given event type recursive, under all sub event types

is_attraction
number (optional) 

filter event by attraction

is_online
number (optional) 

filter event by online

status
string (optional) 

filter events by status

Choices: approved on sale pre-register pre-sale sold out

Event ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/id?scope

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of start date time"
        },
        "end": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of end date time"
        },
        "image_big": {
          "type": [
            "object",
            "null"
          ],
          "properties": {
            "src": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "link to image"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image width"
            },
            "height": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image height"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "src",
            "width",
            "height"
          ],
          "description": "link to event image"
        },
        "image_medium": {
          "type": [
            "object",
            "null"

              "type": "string",
              "description": "link to image"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",

        },

              "type": "string",
              "description": "link to image"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image width"
            },

              "type": "number",
              "description": "image height"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "src",
            "width",
            "height"
          ],
          "description": "link to event image"
        },
        "image_full": {
          "type": [
            "object",

          ],

              "type": "string",
              "description": "link to image"

          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows where extra security mode is enabled"

        "has_tickets": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
        },
        "has_sales_started": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows where event has started sales"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "up to 64KiB bytes lenth"
        },
        "url": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Event link"
        },
        "white_label_url": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "Event white label link"
        },
        "scanning_mode": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "if true - strict mode, if false - soft mode"
        },
        "vat": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float value added tax"
        },
        "is_attraction": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows event is attraction or not"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "approved",
            "on sale",
            "pre-register",
            "pre-sale",
            "sold out"
          ],
          "description": "shows the status of the event"
        },
        "rating": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "event rating"
        },
        "is_online": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows event is online or not"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "organiser": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of organiser"
            },
            "city": {
              "type": "array",
              "description": "id of cities"
            },
            "artist": {
              "type": "array",
              "description": "id of artists"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "organiser",
            "city",
            "artist"
          ]
        },

          "type": "object",

          }

          "type": "object",

          "type": "object",

                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of white label profile"
                },

                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if `true`, hide logo from pdf ticket"
                },

                  "type": [
                    "object",

          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "minimal offer price, `0` - event has free offers, `-1` - price is hidden"
                },
                "is_sold_out": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if true - offers had already sold"

}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event
GET/events/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

  • show.events

  • affiliate.show.events

Header parameters:

  • Api-Currency - (optional) set currency for offer minimal price.

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-H "Api-Currency: USD" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/11634?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=score,price"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 11634,
    "name": "Swanlake API test (TEST EVENT, DO NOT SELL TICKETS)",
    "start": 1510419600,
    "end": 1512590340,
    "vat": 0,
    "image_big": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-full.png",
      "width": 960,
      "height": 361
    },
    "image_medium": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-middle.png",
      "width": 335,
      "height": 126
    },
    "image_small": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-thumb.png",
      "width": 195,
      "height": 74
    },
    "image_full": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-full.png",
      "width": 960,
      "height": 361
    },
    "is_extra_security_mode_on": false,
    "has_tickets": true,
    "has_sales_started": true,
    "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.",
    "url": "https://dubai.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/event_id/event_name",
    "white_label_url": "https://swanlake.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/11634/swanlake-test-event/ticket-office",
    "is_attraction": true,
    "is_online": false,
    "status": "on sale",
    "rating": 12,
    "price": {
        "data": {
            "price": 125,
            "is_sold_out": false,
            "currency": "USD"
        }
    },
    "score": {
        "data": {
            "score": 4.3
        }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

price_scope
string (optional) 

set minimal offer price scope. If there are no offers for specified scope or scope name is invalid: ‘-1’ will be returned. If ‘price_scope’ not set, for ‘scope’ parameter equal to ‘partner-sale.event-tickets’, ‘partner-sale.event-vouchers’ or ‘partner-sale.event-season-tickets’ will be returned minimal offer price for ‘api’ scope, in other cases ‘site’ scope will be applied.

Choices: site api white-label

Event's show list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/id/shows?scope&start_from&start_to&end_from&end_to&city.id
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "start": 1445507578,
      "end": 1445518419,
      "session_count": 3,
      "is_regular": true,
      "has_tickets": true,
      "has_sales_started": true,
      "is_sold_out": false
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Shows not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event's show list
GET/events/{id}/shows?{scope,start_from,start_to,end_from,end_to,city.id}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available sorts:

  • start - default

  • end

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/11634/shows?scope=use.event-tickets"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 12622,
      "name": "Distinctive feature",
      "start": 1510419600,
      "end": 1510430340,
      "has_tickets": true,
      "has_sales_started": true,
      "is_sold_out": false
    },
    {
      "id": 40353,
      "name": null,
      "start": 1512579600,
      "end": 1512590340,
      "has_tickets": true,
      "has_sales_started": true,
      "is_sold_out": false
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 2,
      "count": 2,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 1,
      "links": []
    }
  }
}

int (required)

number (optional)

number (optional)

end_to
number (optional)

number|array[number] (optional)

Event's customer field list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/id/customer-fields?scope&type&is_required&is_enabled
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Company",
      "type": "text",
      "description": "null",
      "target": "offer",
      "is_required": false,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "filling_time": "scanning",
      "type_options": {
        "text_is_multi_line": 0,
        "text_max_fields_count": 1,
        "text_max_length": 100,
        "text_validator": "email",
        "upload_max_file_size": 2048,
        "upload_image_min_width": 0,
        "upload_image_min_height": 0,
        "upload_image_max_width": 0,
        "upload_image_max_height": 0,
        "disclaimer_label": "a little bit text",
        "disclaimer_url": "terms url",
        "date_min": "2017",
        "date_max": "2017",
        "choice_style": "checkbox/dropdown",
        "choice_max_selected_options_count": 2,
        "choice_options": [],
        "choice_is_custom_value_allowed": 1,
        "choice_is_custom_value_shared": 1
      }
    }
  ]
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event does not have customer fields",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event's customer field list
GET/events/{id}/customer-fields?{scope,type,is_required,is_enabled}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/667/customer-fields?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Company",
      "type": "text",
      "description": null,
      "is_required": true,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "target": "offer",
      "filling_time": "checkout",
      "type_options": {
        "text_is_multi_line": 0,
        "text_max_fields_count": 1,
        "text_rows_count": 3,
        "text_max_length": 100
      },
      "parent_id": "4",
      "parent_value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Photo",
      "type": "upload",
      "description": null,
      "is_required": true,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "target": "offer",
      "filling_time": "checkout",
      "type_options": {
        "upload_max_file_size": 4096,
        "upload_image_min_width": null,
        "upload_image_min_height": null,
        "upload_image_max_width": null,
        "upload_image_max_height": null
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "name": "Dog's name",
      "type": "choice",
      "description": null,
      "is_required": true,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "filling_time": "checkout",
      "target": "offer",
      "type_options": {
        "choice_style": "dropdown",
        "choice_max_selected_options_count": "1",
        "choice_is_custom_value_allowed": 0,
        "choice_is_custom_value_shared": 1,
        "choice_options": [
          "Willy",
          "Milly",
          "Pirat"
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}

int (required)

string (required) 

valid scope

Event's badge layout list
GET/events/{id}/badge-layouts?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/11634/badge-layouts?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "field1": {
                "field_type": "text",
                "value": "Organisers text",
                "id_event_customer_field": 0
            },
            "field2": {
                "field_type": "customer_field",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 3
            },
            "field3": {
                "field_type": "customer_field",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 1
            },
            "field4": {
                "field_type": "ticket_type",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 0
            },
            "image": {
                "field_type": "customer_field_image",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 8
            }
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "field1": {
                "field_type": "customer_field",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 1
            },
            "field2": {
                "field_type": "customer_field",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 6
            },
            "field3": {
                "field_type": "user_city",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 0
            },
            "field4": {
                "field_type": "event",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 0
            },
            "image": {
                "field_type": "customer_field_image",
                "value": null,
                "id_event_customer_field": 2
            }
        }
    ]

Event's deliveries list
GET/events/{id}/deliveries?{scope,search,is_self_pickup,is_enabled}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event

  • event_delivery_options

Available sorts:

  • search - default

  • is_self_pickup

  • is_enabled

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/667/deliveries?scope=use.event-tickets&include=event_delivery_option,references"

Response

{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "test delivery",
            "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae",
            "items_per_package": 1,
            "options_title": "test options title",
            "options_style": "select",
            "is_self_pickup": false,
            "is_enabled": true,
            "is_default": true,
            "references": {
                "event": 667,
                "event_delivery_option": [
                    "1",
                    "2"
                ]
            },
            "event_delivery_option": {
                "data": [
                    {
                        "id": 1,
                        "name": "option",
                        "package_price": 10,
                        "is_enabled": true
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 2,
                        "name": "option 2",
                        "package_price": 20,
                        "is_enabled": true
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "test delivery 2",
            "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae",
            "items_per_package": 1,
            "options_title": "test options title 2",
            "options_style": "radio",
            "is_self_pickup": false,
            "is_enabled": true,
            "is_default": false,
            "references": {
                "event": 667,
                "event_delivery_option": [
                    "3",
                    "4"
                ]
            },
            "event_delivery_option": {
                "data": [
                    {
                        "id": 3,
                        "name": "option 3",
                        "package_price": 30,
                        "is_enabled": true
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 4,
                        "name": "option 4",
                        "package_price": 40,
                        "is_enabled": true
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        ...
    ],
    "meta": {
        "pagination": {
            "total": 4,
            "count": 4,
            "per_page": 10,
            "current_page": 1,
            "total_pages": 1,
            "links": []
        }
    }
}

Event's upsell product list
GET/events/{id}/upsell-products?{scope,event_show_id,event_ticket_type_id,event_voucher_type_id,event_season_type_id}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.order-upsell

  • use.order-upsells

Available sorts:

  • order - default - internal order

  • name

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event

  • upsell_questions

  • upsell_items

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/667/upsell-products?scope=partner-sale.order-upsell"

Response

{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 2,
            "quota": 1,
            "quota_type": "per item",
            "product_name": "Upsell test name",
            "is_enabled": true
        },
        {
            "id": 5,
            "quota": null,
            "quota_type": "per item",
            "product_name": "Taxi",
            "is_enabled": true
        }
    ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

event_show_id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter by event show

event_ticket_type_id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter by event ticket type

event_voucher_type_id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter by event voucher type

event_season_type_id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter by event season type

Event's order upsell list

  • partner-sale.order-upsell

  • use.order-upsells

  • references

  • upsell_item

  • order

  • order_upsell_question_answer

  • order_upsell_usage_log

Event's promo media ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/id/promo-medias?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id_event_promo_media": 1,
    "type": "third party video",
    "image": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/18-ffffff-1-0.png",
      "width": 1600,
      "height": 615
    },
    "image_mobile": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/18-ffffff-1.png",
      "width": 768,
      "height": 768
    },
    "video_embed_url": "//www.youtube.com/embed/bS0JOwfkbX0",
    "native_video_url": "null",
    "native_video_mobile_url": "null"
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id_event_promo_media": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event promo media"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "third party video",
            "native video",
            "image"
          ],
          "description": "type of event promo media"
        },
        "image": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "src": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "image link"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image width"
            },
            "height": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image height"
            }
          }
        },
        "image_mobile": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "src": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "image link"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image width"
            },
            "height": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image height"
            }
          }
        },
        "video_embed_url": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "video embed link"
        },
        "native_video_url": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "native video URL"
        },
        "native_video_mobile_url": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "native video mobile URL"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id_event_promo_media",
        "type"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event's promo media
GET/events/{id}/promo-medias?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets,

  • use.event-vouchers,

  • use.event-season-tickets,

  • use.self-serve,

  • get.event-tickets,

  • print.event-tickets,

  • print.event-vouchers,

  • print.event-season-tickets,

  • print.badges,

  • partner-sale.event-tickets,

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers,

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets,

  • partner-sale.receive-payments,

  • show.events,

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/events/667/promo-medias?scope=use.event-tickets"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id_event_promo_media": 19,
      "type": "image",
      "image": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/19-ffffff-4-0.png",
        "width": 1600,
        "height": 615
      },
      "image_mobile": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/19-ffffff-3-1.png",
        "width": 768,
        "height": 768
      },
      "video_embed_url": null,
      "native_video_url": null,
      "native_video_mobile_url": null
    },
    {
      "id_event_promo_media": 21,
      "type": "third party video",
      "image": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/21_upload6448f50c072fc_1682502924-0-en1682502988.jpg",
        "width": 1600,
        "height": 615
      },
      "image_mobile": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/21_upload6448f5494b215_1682502985-1-en1682502988.jpg",
        "width": 768,
        "height": 768
      },
      "video_embed_url": "//www.youtube.com/embed/bS0JOwfkbX0",
      "native_video_url": null,
      "native_video_mobile_url": null
    },
    {
      "id_event_promo_media": 22,
      "type": "native video",
      "image": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/22_upload6448fcff26061_1682504959-0-en1682505130.jpg",
        "width": 1600,
        "height": 615
      },
      "image_mobile": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/22_upload6448fd0345932_1682504963-1-en1682505130.jpg",
        "width": 768,
        "height": 768
      },
      "video_embed_url": null,
      "native_video_url": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/22_upload6448fda3311b1_1682505123-21682505130.mp4",
      "native_video_mobile_url": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/event/promo/22_upload6448fda880e5a_1682505128-31682505130.mp4"
    }
  ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Event show ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • show.events

  • affiliate.show.events

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • city

  • event

  • event_sessions

  • venue

Event show list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows?scope&event.search&has_tickets&start_from&start_to&end_from&end_to&city.id&event.event_type.id&event_type_recursive&event.nearby_city.id
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "start": 1445507578,
      "end": 1445518419,
      "session_count": 3,
      "is_regular": true,
      "has_tickets": true,
      "has_sales_started": true,
      "is_sold_out": false
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event show list
GET/event-shows?{scope,event.search,has_tickets,start_from,start_to,end_from,end_to,city.id,event.event_type.id,event_type_recursive,event.nearby_city.id}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available sorts:

  • start - default

  • end

  • event.rating - higher rating value - more popular event. For retrieving popular events on top specify -rating sort

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event,event_sessions"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 12622,
      "start": 1510419600,
      "end": 1510430340,
      "session_count": 3,
      "is_regular": false,
      "has_tickets": true,
      "has_sales_started": true,
      "is_sold_out": false,
      "event": {
         "data": {
           "id": 11634,
           "name": "Swanlake API test (TEST EVENT, DO NOT SELL TICKETS)",
           "start": 1510419600,
           "end": 1512590340,
           "vat": 0,
           "image_big": {
             "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-full.png",
             "width": 960,
             "height": 361
           },
           "image_medium": {
             "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-middle.png",
             "width": 335,
             "height": 126
           },
           "image_small": {
             "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-thumb.png",
             "width": 195,
             "height": 74
           },
           "is_extra_security_mode_on": false,
           "has_tickets": true,
           "has_sales_started": true,
           "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.",
           "url": "https://platinumlist.net/event-tickets/11634/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634",
           "white_label_url": "https://swanlake.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/11634/swanlake-test-event/ticket-office",
           "is_attraction": false,
           "is_online": false,
           "status": "on sale",
           "rating": 12
         }
      },
      "event_sessions": {
        "data": [
          {
            "id": 11634,
            "start": 1510419600,
            "end": 1512590340,
            "performance_beginning": null,
            "distinctive_features": null
          },
          ...
        ]
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 1356,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 136,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event,event_sessions&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

event.search
string (optional) 

query string to search by event name

has_tickets
string (optional) 

return only shows with tickets

start_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering show by date start

start_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering show by date start

end_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering show by date end

end_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering show by date end

city.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter show by city

event.nearby_city.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter event by nearby city

event.event_type.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter show by event type

is_online
number (optional) 

filter shows by event online

event_type_recursive
boolean (optional) Default: false 

if it’s set to true, show will be searched also under given event type recursive, under all sub event types

event.status
string (optional) 

filter shows by event status

Choices: approved on sale pre-register pre-sale sold out

Event show ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/id?scope

Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,

    "end": 1445518419,
