        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event show"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
        },
        "end": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of end date time"
        },
        "session_count": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "sessions count per show"
        },
        "is_regular": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "`false` - ticket can be used on all sessions (one or more) e.g. One day show, Multi day conference `true` - ticket can be used once on any sessions e.g. Parks, museums, zoo"
        },
        "has_tickets": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
        },
        "has_sales_started": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows where event has started sales"
        },
        "is_sold_out": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows where all tickets sold out"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event"
            },
            "venue": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of venue"
            },
            "city": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of city"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event",
            "venue",
            "city"
          ]
        },
        "city": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of city"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "timezone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "timezone"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "timezone"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "venue": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of venue"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "info": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "location": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "phone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "website": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "latitude": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "longitude": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "image_big": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to venue image"
                },
                "image_small": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to venue image"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "image_big",
                "image_small"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "image_big": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_medium": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_small": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_full": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "is_extra_security_mode_on": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where extra security mode is enabled"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "description": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "up to 64KiB bytes lenth"
                },
                "url": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Event link"
                },
                "white_label_url": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "Event white label link"
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if true - strict mode, if false - soft mode"
                },
                "vat": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float value added tax"
                },
                "is_attraction": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is attraction or not"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "approved",
                    "on sale",
                    "pre-register",
                    "pre-sale",
                    "sold out"
                  ],
                  "description": "shows the status of the event"
                },
                "rating": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "event rating"
                },
                "is_online": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is online or not"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "start",
                "end",
                "image_big",
                "image_medium",
                "image_small",
                "image_full",
                "is_extra_security_mode_on",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "description",
                "url",
                "scanning_mode",
                "vat",
                "is_attraction",
                "status",
                "rating",
                "is_online"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_sessions": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "start",
        "end",
        "session_count",
        "is_regular",
        "has_tickets",
        "has_sales_started",
        "is_sold_out"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Show not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event show
GET/event-shows/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event,event_sessions"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 12622,
    "start": 1510419600,
    "end": 1510430340,
    "has_tickets": true,
    "session_count": 3,
    "is_regular": false,
    "has_sales_started": true,
    "is_sold_out": false,
    "event": {
      "data": {
        "id": 11634,
        "name": "Swanlake API test (TEST EVENT, DO NOT SELL TICKETS)",
        "start": 1510419600,
        "end": 1512590340,
        "vat": 0,
        "image_big": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-full.png",
          "width": 960,
          "height": 361
        },
        "image_medium": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/event/swanlake_api_test_dont_sale_tickets_for_2016_dec_31_101_dining_lounge_and_bar_11634-middle.png",

Event show's session list
GET/event-shows/{id}/sessions?{scope,search,start_from,start_to,end_from}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/sessions?scope=use.event-tickets&include=references,event_show"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 12,
      "start": 1504880700,
      "end": 1504891500,
      "performance_beginning": null,
      "distinctive_features": null,
      "references": {
        "event_show": 12622
      },
      "event_show": {
        "data": {
          "id": 718,
          "start": 1504880700,
          "end": 1506200340,
          "session_count": 3,
          "is_regular": false,
          "has_tickets": true,
          "has_sales_started": true,
          "is_sold_out": false
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 12,
      "start": 1504880700,
      "end": 1504891500,
      "performance_beginning": null,
      "distinctive_features": null,
      "references": {
          "event_show": 12622
      },
      "event_show": {
        "data": {
          "id": 718,
          "start": 1504880700,
          "end": 1506200340,
          "session_count": 3,
          "is_regular": false,
          "has_tickets": true,
          "has_sales_started": true,
          "is_sold_out": false
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 21574,
      "count": 100,
      "per_page": 100,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 216,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/sessions?scope=use.event-tickets&include=references,event_show&page=2"

    }

HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

string (optional) 

query string to search by event session distinctive feature

number (optional)

start_to
number (optional)

number (optional)

  • name

Example ¶

Request

-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/map-zones?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 16909,
      "name": "GA",
      "capacity": 100,
      "status": "open",
      "entrance": null,
      "terms": "Discounts may be applied to the full price tickets only when using an Eligible Visa Card issued in Middle East and North Africa (MENA). Discounts will start at 10% off the full price tickets for Visa Platinum, debit, or prepaid cards, 15% off for Visa Signature, and 20% off for Visa Infinite cards issued in MENA.  Discretion as to whether your payment method constitutes an Eligible Visa Card lies solely with the ticket vendor. To receive the discount, cardholders will need to purchase the tickets online via Platinum List or directly at the Exhibition using their Eligible Visa Card. Please ensure the discount is applied before finalizing your ticket purchases.  Discounts cannot be combined with other offers, including “combo” tickets with Burj Khalifa or with the Dubai Aquarium, nor on otherwise discounted tickets.  Children’s’ tickets may still be eligible for the above discount.Subject to availability, there is no limit to the number of tickets that can be purchased. The exhibition will be open from Sunday to Saturday 10:00 am-10:00pm. Please check availability before visiting. Last admission is generally 60 minutes before close.\n\nVisa is in no way responsible for managing any element of this offer, or the Designing 007 exhibit itself.  Any issues or complaints in relation to the above discount should be directed only to info@jamesbondexhibition-dubai.com. By participating in any element of this discount offer, you agree to the above terms and conditions, and further agree to indemnify and hold harmless Visa (and its associated companies) from any liabilities, damages, or the lost opportunity to participate or receive the discount, for any reasons.  Separate terms and conditions by other sponsors, ticket vendors, event organizers etc. may also govern elements of this discount.\n\nTickets are non refundable non changeable and non transferable. On entry customer must display a valid photo identification document such as original emirates ID, driving license, or original passport along with matching name on the debit / credit card that was used for purchase. Online ticket resale is prohibited. If the ticket is bought via a reseller such as Onlineticketshop ,Viagogo or Dubizzle it is considered invalid, entry to the event will be declined. It is the responsibility of the customer to be of the correct age required to enter the event. It is customers responsibility to abide by the dress code set by the Event Organiser if any. If the customer is declined entry by the Event Organiser for any reason Platinumlist is not liable to refund the tickets. It is the responsibility of the customer to attend the event at the correct time. Non-attended events will not be refunded by Platinumlist. Platinumlist accepts no responsibility for any personal property lost or stolen, or injury or any losses sustained at the event. Platinumlist will not be responsible for any lost or damaged tickets. Exchanging of seats / tickets or categories is not allowed. One person per ticket. The ticket is valid only for the specified show and cannot be reused across multiple events. Event Organiser has the right to refuse entry once the show has started. No re-entry. Event artist lineup is subject to change at any time. Ticket resale is strictly prohibited, tickets purchased by ticket resellers will be canceled and will not be refunded.",

      "is_general_admission": true,

URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

search
string (optional) 

query string to search map zone by name

status
string (optional) 

filter map zone by status

Choices: open closed sold out

is_table
number (optional) 

show only map zone with/without tables

is_general_admission
number (optional) 

show only map zone without/with seats

event_ticket_type.id
number (optional) 

show map zones by id event ticket type

event_season_ticket_type.id
number (optional) 

show map zones by id event season ticket type

"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/voucher-types?scope=partner-sale.event-vouchers"

      "is_price_hidden": false

Event show's offer list
GET/event-shows/{id}/offers?{scope,type,is_season,is_available,event_map_zone.id,event_voucher_type.id}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • show.events

  • affiliate.show.events

Available sorts:

  • order - default - internal order

  • name

  • price

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/offers?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&event_map_zone.id=16909"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 29886,
      "name": "GA",
      "price": 100,
      "currency": "AED",
      "description": null,
      "admit_count": 1,
      "ticket_count": 1,
      "voucher_count": 0,
      "season_ticket_count": 0,
      "type": "ticket",
      "is_season": false,
      "is_available": true
    },
    ...
  ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

type
string (optional) 

filter offer by type

Choices: ticket season-ticket table voucher package

is_season
number (required) 

show only season/non-season offers

is_available
number (required) 

show only available/non-available offers

event_map_zone.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter show by event map zone

event_voucher_type.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter show by event voucher type

promo_code
string (optional) 

valid promo code

Event show's season ticket list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/id/season-tickets?scope&ident&event_map_zone.id&event_season_ticket_type.id&event_offer.id&order.completed_from&order.completed_to

Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "ident": "12345-67890123456",
      "price": 1000,
      "used_count": 3
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event show's season ticket list
GET/event-shows/{id}/season-tickets?{scope,ident,event_map_zone.id,event_season_ticket_type.id,event_offer.id,order.completed_from,order.completed_to}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/season-tickets?scope=use.event-season-tickets&include=references%2Corder%2Corder.user%2Cseating_position"

    }

HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

ident
string|array[string] (optional) 

filter season ticket by ident

event_map_zone.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter season ticket by event map zone

event_season_ticket_type.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter season ticket by event season ticket type

event_offer.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter season ticket by event offer

order.completed_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering season ticket by order completed

order.completed_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering season ticket by order completed

Event show's service list ¶

Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "REFUND GUARANTEE SERVICE",
      "price": {
        "fixed": 10,
        "percent": 10,
        "basket": 10
      },
      "currency": "AED",
      "description": "Info"
    }
  ]
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event show's service list

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • references

  • event

-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/services?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets"

{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 857,
            "name": "Send me tickets via sms",
            "description": "Receive the link to download your tickets via sms for extra convenience.\nNote that you will be able to download pdf tickets after purchase anyway, free of any charges.",
            "price": {
                "fixed": 1,
                "percent": 0,
                "basket": 1
            },
            "currency": "AED"
        },
        {
            "id": 1839,
            "name": "personal hitchhiker guide",
            "description": "",
            "price": {
                "fixed": 15,
                "percent": 0,
                "basket": 15
            },
            "currency": "AED"
        }
    ]

  • use.event-season-tickets

Event session list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-sessions?scope&search&event.search&has_tickets&start_from&start_to&end_from&city.id&event.event_type.id&event_type_recursive
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "start": 1445507578,
    "end": 1445518419,
    "performance_beginning": 1445518419,
    "distinctive_features": "Line up"
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event session"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
        },
        "end": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of end date time"
        },
        "performance_beginning": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of start date time"
        },
        "distinctive_features": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "event session distinctive features"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "start",
        "end",
        "performance_beginning"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event session list
GET/event-sessions?{scope,search,event.search,has_tickets,start_from,start_to,end_from,city.id,event.event_type.id,event_type_recursive}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available sorts:

  • start - default

  • end

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-sessions?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references,event_show"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 14,
      "start": 1477418400,
      "end": 1478383140,
      "performance_beginning": null,
      "distinctive_features": null,
      "references": {
        "event_show": 12622
      },
      "event_show": {
        "data": {
          "id": 12622,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "session_count": 2,
          "is_regular": true,
          "has_tickets": true,
          "has_sales_started": true,
          "is_sold_out": false
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 1356,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 136,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-sessions?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references,event&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

search
string (optional) 

query string to search by event session distinctive feature

event.search
string (optional) 

query string to search by event name

has_tickets
string (optional) 

return only event sessions with tickets

start_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering session by date start

start_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering session by date start

end_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering session by date end

end_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering session by date end

city.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter event sessions by city

event.event_type.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter event sessions by event type

event_type_recursive
boolean (optional) Default: false 

if it’s set to true, event sessions will be searched also under given event type recursive, under all sub event types

event.status
string (optional) 

filter shows by event status

Choices: approved on sale pre-register pre-sale sold out

Event session ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-sessions/id?scope
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "start": 1445507578,
    "end": 1445518419,
    "performance_beginning": 1445518419,
    "distinctive_features": "Line up",
    "references": {
      "event_show": 1
    },
    "event_show": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "session_count": 3,
        "is_regular": true,
        "has_tickets": true,
        "has_sales_started": true,
        "is_sold_out": false
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event session"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
        },
        "end": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of end date time"
        },
        "performance_beginning": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of start date time"
        },
        "distinctive_features": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "event session distinctive features"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_show": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event show"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_show"
          ]
        },
        "event_show": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event show"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "session_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "sessions count per show"
                },
                "is_regular": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "`false` - ticket can be used on all sessions (one or more) e.g. One day show, Multi day conference `true` - ticket can be used once on any sessions e.g. Parks, museums, zoo"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "is_sold_out": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where all tickets sold out"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "session_count",
                "is_regular",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "is_sold_out"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "start",
        "end",
        "performance_beginning"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Session not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event session

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-sessions/14?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references,event_show"

    "id": 14,
    "start": 1477418400,
    "end": 1478383140,
    "performance_beginning": null,
    "distinctive_features": null,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 12622
    },
    "event_show": {
      "data": {
        "id": 12622,
        "start": 1477418400,
        "end": 1478383140,
        "session_count": 3,
        "is_regular": false,
        "has_tickets": true,
        "has_sales_started": true,

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-map-zones/id?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Silver",
    "capacity": 1000,
    "status": "open",
    "entrance": "G2",
    "terms": "Terms",
    "is_table": true,
    "is_general_admission": true,
    "table_admit_count": 10,
    "age_min": 21,
    "age_max": 50,
    "use_third_party_ident": false,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 1
    },
    "event_show": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "session_count": 3,
        "is_regular": true,
        "has_tickets": true,
        "has_sales_started": true,
        "is_sold_out": false
      }
    },
    "event_ticket_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "Adult",
          "price": 1000,
          "value": 500,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": "Info",
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "scanning_mode": true,
          "is_price_hidden": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_season_ticket_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "Adult",
          "price": 1000,
          "value": 500,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": "Info",
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "is_price_hidden": false,
          "scanning_mode": true
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event map zone"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "capacity": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "open",
            "close",
            "sold out"
          ]
        },
        "entrance": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "entrance gate description"
        },
        "terms": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "is_table": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows when map zone sale tables"
        },
        "is_general_admission": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows when map zone general admission"
        },
        "table_admit_count": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "how many places per table"
        },
        "age_min": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "age restriction. 0 - for no limit"
        },
        "age_max": {
          "type": [
            "number",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "age restriction. null - for no limit"
        },
        "use_third_party_ident": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "true if use \"Third party ident\" service"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_show": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event show"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_show"
          ]
        },
        "event_show": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event show"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "session_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "sessions count per show"
                },
                "is_regular": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "`false` - ticket can be used on all sessions (one or more) e.g. One day show, Multi day conference `true` - ticket can be used once on any sessions e.g. Parks, museums, zoo"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "is_sold_out": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where all tickets sold out"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "session_count",
                "is_regular",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "is_sold_out"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_ticket_types": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_season_ticket_types": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "capacity",
        "status",
        "entrance",
        "terms",
        "is_table",
        "is_general_admission",
        "age_min",
        "age_max"

Event map zone
GET/event-map-zones/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-map-zones/16909?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event_ticket_types,event_season_ticket_types"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 16909,
    "name": "GA",
    "capacity": 100,
    "status": "open",
    "entrance": null,
    "terms": "Discounts may be applied to the full price tickets only when using an Eligible Visa Card issued in Middle East and North Africa (MENA). Discounts will start at 10% off the full price tickets for Visa Platinum, debit, or prepaid cards, 15% off for Visa Signature, and 20% off for Visa Infinite cards issued in MENA.  Discretion as to whether your payment method constitutes an Eligible Visa Card lies solely with the ticket vendor. To receive the discount, cardholders will need to purchase the tickets online via Platinum List or directly at the Exhibition using their Eligible Visa Card. Please ensure the discount is applied before finalizing your ticket purchases.  Discounts cannot be combined with other offers, including “combo” tickets with Burj Khalifa or with the Dubai Aquarium, nor on otherwise discounted tickets.  Children’s’ tickets may still be eligible for the above discount.Subject to availability, there is no limit to the number of tickets that can be purchased. The exhibition will be open from Sunday to Saturday 10:00 am-10:00pm. Please check availability before visiting. Last admission is generally 60 minutes before close.\n\nVisa is in no way responsible for managing any element of this offer, or the Designing 007 exhibit itself.  Any issues or complaints in relation to the above discount should be directed only to info@jamesbondexhibition-dubai.com. By participating in any element of this discount offer, you agree to the above terms and conditions, and further agree to indemnify and hold harmless Visa (and its associated companies) from any liabilities, damages, or the lost opportunity to participate or receive the discount, for any reasons.  Separate terms and conditions by other sponsors, ticket vendors, event organizers etc. may also govern elements of this discount.\n\nTickets are non refundable non changeable and non transferable. On entry customer must display a valid photo identification document such as original emirates ID, driving license, or original passport along with matching name on the debit / credit card that was used for purchase. Online ticket resale is prohibited. If the ticket is bought via a reseller such as Onlineticketshop ,Viagogo or Dubizzle it is considered invalid, entry to the event will be declined. It is the responsibility of the customer to be of the correct age required to enter the event. It is customers responsibility to abide by the dress code set by the Event Organiser if any. If the customer is declined entry by the Event Organiser for any reason Platinumlist is not liable to refund the tickets. It is the responsibility of the customer to attend the event at the correct time. Non-attended events will not be refunded by Platinumlist. Platinumlist accepts no responsibility for any personal property lost or stolen, or injury or any losses sustained at the event. Platinumlist will not be responsible for any lost or damaged tickets. Exchanging of seats / tickets or categories is not allowed. One person per ticket. The ticket is valid only for the specified show and cannot be reused across multiple events. Event Organiser has the right to refuse entry once the show has started. No re-entry. Event artist lineup is subject to change at any time. Ticket resale is strictly prohibited, tickets purchased by ticket resellers will be canceled and will not be refunded.",
    "is_table": false,
    "is_general_admission": true,
    "table_admit_count": 1,
    "age_min": 0,
    "age_max": null,
    "use_third_party_ident": false,
    "event_ticket_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 32832,
          "name": "GA",
          "price": 100,
          "value": 1,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": null,
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": true,
          "scanning_mode": true,
          "is_price_hidden" : true
        },
        {
          "id": 37090,
          "name": "Complimentary GA",
          "price": 0,
          "value": 0,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": null,
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "scanning_mode": false,
          "is_price_hidden" : false
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_season_ticket_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 3283,
          "name": "GA",
          "price": 100,
          "value": 30,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": null,
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "is_price_hidden": false,
          "scanning_mode": true
        },
        {
          "id": 7090,
          "name": "Complimentary GA",
          "price": 0,
          "value": 0,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": null,
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "is_price_hidden": false,
          "scanning_mode": false
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow

int (required) 

event map zone id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Event voucher type ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_show

  • event

Event voucher type ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-voucher-types/id?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Adult",
    "price": 1000,
    "currency": "AED",
    "value": 1000,
    "important_info": "Info",
    "terms": "Terms",
    "is_price_hidden": false,
    "disclaimer_info": "null",
    "custom_title": "null",
    "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
    "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
    "scanning_mode": true,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 1,
      "event": 1
    },
    "event_show": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "session_count": 3,
        "is_regular": true,
        "has_tickets": true,
        "has_sales_started": true,
        "is_sold_out": false
      }
    },
    "event": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Swanlake",
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "image_big": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "image_medium": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "image_small": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "image_full": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "is_extra_security_mode_on": false,
        "has_tickets": true,
        "has_sales_started": true,
        "description": "Lorem ipsum sit dolores...",
        "url": "https://dubai.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/event_id/event_name",
        "white_label_url": "https://swanlake.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/11634/swanlake-test-event/ticket-office",
        "scanning_mode": true,
        "vat": 0,
        "is_attraction": true,
        "status": "approved",
        "rating": 12,
        "is_online": false
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event voucher type"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "currency": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "value": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float value of voucher"
        },
        "important_info": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "terms": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "is_price_hidden": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "show when price must be hidden"
        },
        "disclaimer_info": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "custom_title": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "max_usage_count_per_ticket": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "used only when **scanning_mode** is `false`. If `0` then voucher doesn't have usage limit. If `N` then voucher can use no more than `N` times."
        },
        "is_restrict_reactivation": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "if `true` re-activating the scanned voucher is restrict."
        },
        "scanning_mode": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "if scanning mode is `true`, voucher can be used only once."
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_show": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "id of event show"
            },
            "event": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_show",
            "event"
          ]
        },
        "event_show": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event show"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "session_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "sessions count per show"
                },
                "is_regular": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "`false` - ticket can be used on all sessions (one or more) e.g. One day show, Multi day conference `true` - ticket can be used once on any sessions e.g. Parks, museums, zoo"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "is_sold_out": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where all tickets sold out"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "session_count",
                "is_regular",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "is_sold_out"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "image_big": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_medium": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_small": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_full": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "is_extra_security_mode_on": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where extra security mode is enabled"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "description": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "up to 64KiB bytes lenth"
                },
                "url": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Event link"
                },
                "white_label_url": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "Event white label link"
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if true - strict mode, if false - soft mode"
                },
                "vat": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float value added tax"
                },
                "is_attraction": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is attraction or not"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "approved",
                    "on sale",
                    "pre-register",
                    "pre-sale",
                    "sold out"
                  ],
                  "description": "shows the status of the event"
                },
                "rating": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "event rating"
                },
                "is_online": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is online or not"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "start",
                "end",
                "image_big",
                "image_medium",
                "image_small",
                "image_full",
                "is_extra_security_mode_on",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "description",
                "url",
                "scanning_mode",
                "vat",
                "is_attraction",
                "status",
                "rating",
                "is_online"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "price",
        "currency",
        "value",
        "is_price_hidden",
        "max_usage_count_per_ticket",
        "scanning_mode"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event voucher type
GET/event-voucher-types/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-vouchers

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-voucher-types/65?scope=partner-sale.event-vouchers"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 65,
    "name": "DRINK VOUCHERS",
    "price": 100,
    "currency": "AED",
    "value": 500,
    "important_info": null,
    "terms": null,
    "custom_title": null,
    "disclaimer_info": null,
    "is_price_hidden": false
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event voucher type id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Event offer ¶

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • event_ticket_types

  • event_voucher_types

  • event_season_ticket_types

Event offer ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-offers/id?scope&promo_code
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Adult silver",
    "price": 100,
    "currency": "AED",
    "description": "Info",
    "admit_count": 1,
    "ticket_count": 1,
    "voucher_count": 1,
    "season_ticket_count": 1,
    "type": "ticket",
    "is_season": false,
    "is_available": false,
    "is_package": false,
    "event_ticket_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "Adult",
          "price": 1000,
          "value": 500,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": "Info",
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "scanning_mode": true,
          "is_price_hidden": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_voucher_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "Adult",
          "price": 1000,
          "currency": "AED",
          "value": 1000,
          "important_info": "Info",
          "terms": "Terms",
          "is_price_hidden": false,
          "disclaimer_info": "null",
          "custom_title": "null",
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "scanning_mode": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_season_ticket_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "Adult",
          "price": 1000,
          "value": 500,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": "Info",
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
          "is_price_hidden": false,
          "scanning_mode": true
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event offer"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "currency": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "admit_count": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "admits count per offer"
        },
        "ticket_count": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "count tickets per offer"
        },
        "voucher_count": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "count vouchers per offer"
        },
        "season_ticket_count": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "count season tickets per offer"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "ticket",
            "season ticket",
            "table",
            "voucher",
            "package"
          ]
        },
        "is_season": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows when offer contain tickets for several shows"
        },
        "is_available": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows when offer can be sold"
        },
        "is_package": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows when offer has various tickets or vouchers"
        },
        "event_ticket_types": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_voucher_types": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_season_ticket_types": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "price",
        "currency",
        "description",
        "admit_count",
        "ticket_count",
        "voucher_count",
        "season_ticket_count",
        "type",
        "is_season",
        "is_available",
        "is_package"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event offer
GET/event-offers/{id}?{scope,promo_code}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-offers/29886?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event_ticket_types%2Cevent_voucher_types%2Cevent_season_ticket_types"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 29886,
    "name": "GA",
    "price": 100,
    "currency": "AED",
    "description": null,
    "admit_count": 1,
    "ticket_count": 1,
    "voucher_count": 0,
    "season_ticket_count": 0,
    "type": "ticket",
    "is_season": false,
    "is_available": true,
    "event_ticket_types": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 32832,
          "name": "GA",
          "price": 100,
          "value": 0,
          "currency": "AED",
          "important_info": null,
          "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
          "scanning_mode": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_voucher_types": {
      "data": []
    },
    "event_season_ticket_types": {
      "data": []
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event offer id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

promo_code
string (optional) 

valid promo code for specified event offer

Event offer list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-offers?scope&id
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Adult silver",
      "price": 100,
      "currency": "AED",
      "description": "Info",
      "admit_count": 1,
      "ticket_count": 1,
      "voucher_count": 1,
      "season_ticket_count": 1,
      "type": "ticket",
      "is_season": false,
      "is_available": false,
      "is_package": false
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event offer list
GET/event-offers?{scope,id}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-offers?scope=use.event-season-tickets&id=1422235,1422236"

Response

[
  {
    "id": 1422235,
    "name": "Season ticket",
    "price": 0,
    "currency": "AED",
    "description": null,
    "admit_count": 1,
    "ticket_count": 0,
    "voucher_count": 0,
    "season_ticket_count": 1,
    "type": "season ticket",
    "is_package": false,
    "is_season": false,
    "is_available": true
  },
  {
    "status": "error",
    "id": 1422236,
    "message": "You have no access to this event offer"
  }
]
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

id
int (required) 

event offer id list

Event ticket ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_show

  • event_ticket_usages

  • event_ticket_type

  • event_ticket_template_config

  • order

  • seating_position

  • customer_fields

Event ticket ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/id?scope
Responses200404404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "ident": "12345-67890123456",
    "price": 1000,
    "alternate_ident": "1234567889",
    "used_count": 3,
    "valid_until": 1445507578,
    "online_url": "null",
    "online_instructions": "null",
    "references": {
      "event_show": 1,
      "event_ticket_type": 1,
      "order": 1,
      "seating_position": 1,
      "event_offer": 1
    },
    "event_show": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "session_count": 3,
        "is_regular": true,
        "has_tickets": true,
        "has_sales_started": true,
        "is_sold_out": false
      }
    },
    "event_ticket_usages": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "timestamp": 1445507578,
          "is_used": true,
          "collector_alias": "Bob",
          "usage_summary": 1
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_ticket_type": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Adult",
        "price": 1000,
        "value": 500,
        "currency": "AED",
        "important_info": "Info",
        "max_usage_count_per_ticket": 0,
        "is_restrict_reactivation": false,
        "scanning_mode": true,
        "is_price_hidden": true
      }
    },
    "event_ticket_template_config": [
      [
        "data"
      ]
    ],
    "order": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "completed": 1445507578,
        "comment": "Some text",
        "is_preprinted": true,
        "extended_verification_code": "Some text",
        "is_delayed_delivery": true,
        "ticket_waiting_text": "Your tickets will be sent in a few minutes",
        "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
        "amount": 544.38,
        "currency": "'AED'",
        "status": "completed",
        "is_white_label": false,
        "sale_integration": "'DTCM'",
        "timezone": "'Asia/Dubai'",
        "payment_type": "'PG name'"
      }
    },
    "seating_position": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "row": "A",
        "place": "5"
      }
    },
    "customer_fields": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id_event_ticket": 1869,
          "id_event_voucher": 236,
          "id_event_season_ticket": 1834,
          "id_order": 53689,
          "id_event_customer_field": 2,
          "value": "Company",
          "update_datetime": "2018"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event ticket"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if ticket was uploaded by organiser"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "alternate_ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if ticket was uploaded by organiser"
        },
        "used_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "valid_until": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of ticket expiry date"
        },
        "online_url": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "url to online event show"
        },
        "online_instructions": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "instructions for online event show"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_show": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event show"
            },
            "event_ticket_type": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event ticket type"
            },
            "order": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of order"
            },
            "seating_position": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "id of seating position"
            },
            "event_offer": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event offer"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_show",
            "event_ticket_type",
            "order",
            "seating_position",
            "event_offer"
          ]
        },
        "event_show": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event show"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "session_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "sessions count per show"
                },
                "is_regular": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "`false` - ticket can be used on all sessions (one or more) e.g. One day show, Multi day conference `true` - ticket can be used once on any sessions e.g. Parks, museums, zoo"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "is_sold_out": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where all tickets sold out"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "session_count",
                "is_regular",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "is_sold_out"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_ticket_usages": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_ticket_type": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event ticket type"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float price"
                },
                "value": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float custom value"
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "important_info": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "max_usage_count_per_ticket": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "used only when **scanning_mode** is `false`. If `0` then ticket doesn't have usage limit per session. If `N` then ticket can use no more than `N` times."
                },
                "is_restrict_reactivation": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if `true` re-activating the scanned ticket is restrict."
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if scanning mode is `true`, ticket can be used only once per session."
                },
                "is_price_hidden": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if price hidden is `true`, hidden price in ticket"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "price",
                "value",
                "currency",
                "max_usage_count_per_ticket",
                "scanning_mode",
                "is_price_hidden"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_ticket_template_config": {
          "type": "array"
        },
        "order": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of order"
                },
                "completed": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp when order was completed"
                },
                "comment": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "is_preprinted": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "extended_verification_code": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "is_delayed_delivery": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "purchased tickets will be sent to the user with some delay"
                },
                "ticket_waiting_text": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "expiration_datetime": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp when order expires"
                },
                "amount": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "order amount"
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "order currency"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "completed",
                    "expired",
                    "pending payment"
                  ],
                  "description": "order status"
                },
                "is_white_label": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "sale_integration": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "timezone": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "payment_type": {
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "completed",
                "comment",
                "is_preprinted",
                "expiration_datetime",
                "amount",
                "currency",
                "status",
                "is_white_label",
                "timezone"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "seating_position": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of seating position"
                },
                "row": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "seat row"
                },

                  "type": "string",

                "row",
                "place"
