              "type": "array"

        "id",

        "price",
        "used_count",
        "valid_until",
        "online_url",
        "online_instructions"
      ]
    }
  }
}

  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid ticket status for current operation",
    "code": "107"
  }
}
Headers

Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event ticket not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event ticket
GET/event-tickets/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/262535?scope=use.event-tickets&include=references%2Corder%2Corder.user%2Cseating_position,event_ticket_usages,event_ticket_template_config"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 262535,
    "price": 300,
    "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
    "alternate_ident": "",
    "used_count": 3,
    "valid_until": "1457946680",
    "online_url": null,
    "online_instructions": null,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 12622,
      "order": 62982,
      "event_ticket_type": 3278,
      "seating_position": 14863,
      "event_offer": 196
    },
    "order": {
      "data": {
        "id": 62982,
        "completed": 1366903516,
        "comment": "",
        "is_preprinted": false,
        "extended_verification_code": "",
        "is_delayed_delivery": false,
        "ticket_waiting_text" : "",
        "user": {
          "data": {
            "id": 66904,
            "name": "lolosh ololo",
            "email": "flex301@gmail.com",
            "phone": "+971520000002"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "event_ticket_usages": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 123,
          "timestamp": 1457946680,
          "is_used": true
        },
        {
          "id": 124,
          "timestamp": 1457946680,
          "is_used": false
        },
        ...
      ]
    },
    "seating_position": {
      "data": {
        "id": 14863,
        "row": "M",
        "place": "13"
      }
    },
    "event_ticket_template_config": {
      "data": {
        "online": {
          "regular": "{\"width\":793.7007,\"height\":1122.5196,\"elements\":[]}",
          "boca": null,
          "badge": null,
          "wristband": null,
          "fastbadge": null
        },
        "pre-printing": {
          "regular": "{\"width\":793.7007,\"height\":1122.5196,\"elements\":[]}",
          "boca": null,
          "badge": null,
          "wristband": null,
          "fastbadge": null
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow

int (required)

string (required) 

valid scope

  "event_session.id": 13,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"

      "type": "string",

Modify ticket
PATCH/event-tickets/{id}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

Validate ¶

Validate ticket and mark it as used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.event-tickets

  • operation string (required) - validate

  • event_session.id integer (required) - id of event session

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

  • usage_updated string (optional) - operation timestamp, format Y-m-d H:i:s

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "use.event-tickets",
  "operation": "validate",
  "event_session.id": 12,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/262535"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 262535,
    "price": 300,
    "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
    "alternate_ident": "",
    "used_count": 3,
    "valid_until": "1457946680",
    "online_url": null,
    "online_instructions": null
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}

Devalidate ¶

Validate ticket and mark it as not used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.event-tickets

  • operation string (required) - devalidate

  • event_session.id number (required) - id of event session

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

  • usage_updated string (optional) - operation timestamp, format Y-m-d H:i:s

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "use.event-tickets",
  "operation": "devalidate",
  "event_session.id": 12,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/262535"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 262535,
    "price": 300,
    "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
    "alternate_ident": "",
    "used_count": 3,
    "valid_until": "1457946680",
    "online_url": null,
    "online_instructions": null
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event ticket id

Batch modify tickets ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
        "transactional": false,
        "data": [
            {
               "scope": "use.event-tickets", 
               "operation": "validate", 
               "event_session.id": 12, 
               "collector_alias": "Bob",
               "ident": "11634-5B34FD49"
               "id": 1, 
            },
            {
               "scope": "use.event-tickets", 
               "operation": "devalidate", 
               "event_session.id": 13,
               "ident": "11634-60BD772C"
               "id": 2, 
            }
        ]
    }
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "transactional": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "default `false`"
    },
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id": 1,
      "ident": "124345",
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_updated": 1234567
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "Event ticket not found"
  }
]
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "array"
}

Batch modify tickets
PATCH/event-tickets

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

Body parameters:

  • transactional bool (optional, default false) - determine how operations will be processed:

    • true - if any operation generates an error then all operations are not processed
    • false - each operation is processed separately

  • data array (required) - array of patch operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the patching of a single ticket plus you must pass id or ident of ticket

Example ¶

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "transactional":true,
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "use.event-tickets",
      "operation": "validate",
      "event_session.id": 12,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "id": 262535
    },
    {
      "scope": "use.event-tickets",
      "operation": "devalidate",
      "event_session.id": "13",
      "ident": "11634-60BD772C"
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets"

Response

[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id": 262535,
      "price": 300,
      "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
      "alternate_ident": "",
      "used_count": 3,
      "valid_until": "1457946680",
      "online_url": null,
      "online_instructions": null
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "failed",
    "message": "Ticket is already reactivated",
    "data": {
      "id": 262536,
      "price": 300,
      "ident": "11634-60BD772C",
      "alternate_ident": "",
      "used_count": 3,
      "valid_until": "1457946680",
      "online_url": null,
      "online_instructions": null
    }
  }
]

Event ticket usage list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/id/usages?scope&event_session.id&user.id&used_from&used_to&is_used&collector_alias
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "timestamp": 1445507578,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_summary": 1
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event ticket usage list
GET/event-tickets/{id}/usages?{scope,event_session.id,user.id,used_from,used_to,is_used,collector_alias}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • event_ticket

  • event_session

  • user

  • references

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/262535/usages?scope=use.event-tickets&include=references,event_ticket,event_session,user"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 223,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "distinctive_features": null,
      "references": {
        "event_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "user": 78374
      }, 
      "event_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "alternate_ident": "29722492266210",
          "used_count": 3,
          "valid_until": "1457946680"
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 12,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 224,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "",
      "distinctive_features": null,
      "references": {
        "event_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "collector": 1
      },
      "event_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "alternate_ident": "29722492266210",
          "used_count": 3,
          "valid_until": "1457946680"
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 14,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 21574,
      "count": 100,
      "per_page": 100,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 216,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/sessions?scope=use.event-tickets&include=references,event_show&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}

string (optional)

string (optional)

number (optional)

Event ticket usage log list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/id/usage-logs?scope&event_session.id&user.id&used_from&used_to&is_used&collector_alias
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "timestamp": 1445507578,
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "references": {
      "event_ticket_usage": 1,
      "user": 1
    },
    "event_ticket_usage": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "timestamp": 1445507578,
        "is_used": true,
        "collector_alias": "Bob",
        "usage_summary": 1
      }
    },
    "collector": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Smith",
        "email": "foo@example.com",
        "phone": "+971501234567"
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event ticket usage"
        },
        "timestamp": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of used datetime"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "is used status"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_ticket_usage": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event ticket usage"
            },
            "user": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of user who last used ticket"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_ticket_usage",
            "user"
          ]
        },
        "event_ticket_usage": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event ticket usage"
                },
                "timestamp": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of used datetime"
                },
                "is_used": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "is used status"
                },
                "collector_alias": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "collector alias"
                },
                "usage_summary": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "ticket usage summary per session"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "timestamp",
                "is_used",
                "collector_alias"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "collector": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of user"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "user full user"
                },
                "email": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "email"
                },
                "phone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "phone"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "email",
                "phone"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "timestamp",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event ticket usage log list
GET/event-tickets/{id}/usage-logs?{scope,event_session.id,user.id,used_from,used_to,is_used,collector_alias}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • user

  • event_ticket_usage

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/262535/usage-logs?scope=use.event-tickets&include=user"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 224,
      "timestamp": 1504880710,
      "is_used": false,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 223,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 21574,
      "count": 100,
      "per_page": 100,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 216,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/262535/usage-logs?scope=use.event-tickets&include=user&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}

Ticket's customer field list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/id/customer-fields?scope
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Company",
      "type": "text",
      "description": "null",
      "target": "offer",
      "is_required": false,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "filling_time": "scanning",
      "type_options": {
        "text_is_multi_line": 0,
        "text_max_fields_count": 1,
        "text_max_length": 100,
        "text_validator": "email",
        "upload_max_file_size": 2048,
        "upload_image_min_width": 0,
        "upload_image_min_height": 0,
        "upload_image_max_width": 0,
        "upload_image_max_height": 0,
        "disclaimer_label": "a little bit text",
        "disclaimer_url": "terms url",
        "date_min": "2017",
        "date_max": "2017",
        "choice_style": "checkbox/dropdown",
        "choice_max_selected_options_count": 2,
        "choice_options": [],
        "choice_is_custom_value_allowed": 1,
        "choice_is_custom_value_shared": 1
      }
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event ticket does not have customer fields",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Ticket's customer field list
GET/event-tickets/{id}/customer-fields?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • event_customer_field

Example ¶

Returns customer fields with target type ticket only

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/1868/customer-fields?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 1,
      "value": "General"
    },
    {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 2,
      "value": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/order-customer-files/69_1b464cad9ad251d89a4747112f047392-0.png",
          "width": 1024,
          "height": 1024
      }
    }
  ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow

int (required) 

event ticket id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

      "id_event_voucher": 236,
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1834,
      "id_order": 53689,
      "id_event_customer_field": 2,
      "value": "Company",
      "update_datetime": "2018"
    }
  ]

      "type": "array"

  "error": {
    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": "104"
  }

Ticket customer field
GET/event-tickets/{id}/customer-fields/{idEventCustomerField}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/1868/customer-fields/1?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id_event_ticket": 1868,
        "id_event_customer_field": 1,
        "value": "Custom text"
    }
}

int (required)

string (required) 

valid scope

int (required)

Add or replace customer field ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/id/customer-fields
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": [
    "example string"
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "`print.badges`"
    },
    "id_event_customer_field": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "event customer field id"
    },
    "value": {
      "type": "array",
      "description": "customer field value"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "id_event_customer_field"
  ]
}
Responses200400400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id_event_ticket": 1868,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": [
      "example string"
    ]
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": "104"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid value for customer field",
    "code": 300,
    "invalid_fields": {
      "value": {
        "errorCode": "errorMessage"
      }
    }
  }
}

Add or replace customer field
POST/event-tickets/{id}/customer-fields

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Add or replace value in ticket customer field by event customer field id

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - print.badges

  • id_event_customer_field number (required) - event customer field id

  • value string or array (optional, nullable) - customer field value

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": [
    "example string"
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/1868/customer-fields"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id_event_ticket": 1868,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": [
      "example string"
    ]
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event ticket id

Batch ticket customer fields ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/id/customer-fields/batch
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Responses200400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  }
]
Headers
Content-Type: application/json

Batch ticket customer fields
POST/event-tickets/{id}/customer-fields/batch

Caution ¶

For upload image use header Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Body parameters:

  • data array (required) - array of add operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the adding of a single customer field plus you must pass id_event_customer_filed of event customer field

Example ¶

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/1868/customer-fields/batch"

or

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-F "data[0][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[0][id_event_customer_field]=3" -F "data[0][value]=2001-12-29" \
-F "data[1][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[1][id_event_customer_field]=20" -F "data[1][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[2][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[2][id_event_customer_field]=25" -F "data[2][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[3][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[3][id_event_customer_field]=32" -F "data[3][value]=1970-01-01" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-tickets/1868/customer-fields/batch"

Response

[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32, 
      "value": "1970-01-01",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  }
]
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event ticket id

Event ticket usage ¶

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • event_ticket

  • event_session

  • user

  • references

Event ticket usage list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-ticket-usages?scope&event_session.id&user.id&used_from&used_to&is_used&collector_alias
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "timestamp": 1445507578,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_summary": 1
    }
  ]
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event ticket usage list
GET/event-ticket-usages?{scope,event_session.id,user.id,used_from,used_to,is_used,collector_alias}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-ticket-usages?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references,event_ticket,event_session,user"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 223,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_summary": 1,
      "references": {
        "event_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "user": 78374
      }, 
      "event_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "alternate_ident": "29722492266210",
          "used_count": 3,
          "valid_until": "1457946680"
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 12,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "session_count": 3,
          "type": "common",
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 224,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "",
      "usage_summary": 1,
      "references": {
        "event_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "collector": 1
      },
      "event_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "alternate_ident": "29722492266210",
          "used_count": 3,
          "valid_until": "1457946680"
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 14,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "session_count": 3,
          "type": "common",
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 1356,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 136,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-sessions?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

event_session.id
string (optional) 

filtering by event session id

user.id
string (optional) 

filtering by user id

used_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

used_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

is_used
number (optional) 

filtering by is used status

collector_alias
string (optional) 

collector alias

Event ticket usage ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-ticket-usages/id?scope
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "timestamp": 1445507578,
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "usage_summary": 1,
    "references": {
      "event_ticket": 1,
      "event_session": 1,
      "user": 1
    },
    "event_ticket": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "ident": "12345-67890123456",
        "price": 1000,
        "alternate_ident": "1234567889",
        "used_count": 3,
        "valid_until": 1445507578,
        "online_url": "null",
        "online_instructions": "null"
      }
    },
    "event_session": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "performance_beginning": 1445518419,
        "distinctive_features": "Line up"
      }
    },
    "user": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Smith",
        "email": "foo@example.com",
        "phone": "+971501234567",
        "gender": "m",
        "birthday": "1988-02-15",
        "is_closed": false,
        "is_blocked": false
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event ticket usage"
        },
        "timestamp": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of used datetime"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "is used status"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "usage_summary": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "ticket usage summary per session"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_ticket": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event ticket"
            },
            "event_session": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event session"
            },
            "user": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of user who last used ticket"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_ticket",
            "event_session",
            "user"
          ]
        },
        "event_ticket": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event ticket"
                },
                "ident": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if ticket was uploaded by organiser"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float price"
                },
                "alternate_ident": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if ticket was uploaded by organiser"
                },
                "used_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                },
                "valid_until": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of ticket expiry date"
                },
                "online_url": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "url to online event show"
                },
                "online_instructions": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "instructions for online event show"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "ident",
                "price",
                "used_count",
                "valid_until",
                "online_url",
                "online_instructions"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_session": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event session"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "performance_beginning": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time"
                },
                "distinctive_features": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "event session distinctive features"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "performance_beginning"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "user": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of user"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "user full name"
                },
                "email": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "email"
                },
                "phone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "phone"
                },
                "gender": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "enum": [
                    "m",
                    "f",
                    null
                  ],
                  "description": "gender"
                },
                "birthday": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "birth date"
                },
                "is_closed": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account closed"
                },
                "is_blocked": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account blocked"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "email",
                "phone",
                "gender",
                "birthday",
                "is_closed",
                "is_blocked"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "timestamp",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event ticket usage not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event ticket usage
GET/event-ticket-usages/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-ticket-usages/14?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references,event_ticket,event_session,user"

Response

{
  "id": 224,
  "timestamp": 1504880700,
  "is_used": true,
  "collector_alias": "Bob",
  "usage_summary": 2,
  "references": {
    "event_ticket": 262535,
    "event_session": 12,
    "collector": 1
  },
  "event_ticket": {
    "data": {
      "id": 262535,
      "price": 99.95,
      "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
      "alternate_ident": "29722492266210",
      "used_count": 3,
      "valid_until": "1457946680"
    }
  },
  "event_session": {
    "data": {
      "id": 14,
      "start": 1477418400,
      "end": 1478383140,
      "performance_beginning": null,
      "distinctive_features": null
    }
  },
  "user": {
    "data": {
      "id": 78374,
      "name": "Paul Macys",
      "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
      "phone": "+971529061101"
    }
  }
}

int (required)

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Event voucher ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-vouchers

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_show

  • event_voucher_type

  • event_ticket_template_config

  • order

  • customer_fields

Event voucher ¶

Responses200404404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "ident": "1234-567890123",
    "price": 1000,
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",

    "valid_until": 1558515840,
    "usage_summary": 1,

      "event_show": 1,

      "order": 1,
      "event_offer": 1
    },

      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "session_count": 3,

        "has_sales_started": true,
        "is_sold_out": false
      }
    },

      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Adult",
        "price": 1000,
        "currency": "AED",
        "value": 1000,
        "important_info": "Info",
        "terms": "Terms",

      [
        "data"
      ]
    ],

        "id": 1,

        "comment": "Some text",
        "is_preprinted": true,
        "extended_verification_code": "Some text",
        "is_delayed_delivery": true,
        "ticket_waiting_text": "Your tickets will be sent in a few minutes",
        "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
        "amount": 544.38,
        "currency": "'AED'",
        "status": "completed",

        "sale_integration": "'DTCM'",

        "payment_type": "'PG name'"
      }
    },
    "customer_fields": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id_event_ticket": 1869,

          "id_event_customer_field": 2,

        }

    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event voucher"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if voucher was uploaded by organiser"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "usage_updated": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of last usage change"
        },
        "valid_until": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "vouchers valid timestamp"
        },
        "usage_summary": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "voucher usage summary"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_show": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "id of event show"
            },
            "event_voucher_type": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event voucher type"
            },
            "order": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of order"
            },
            "event_offer": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event offer"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_show",
            "event_voucher_type",
            "order",
            "event_offer"
          ]
        },
        "event_show": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event show"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "session_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "sessions count per show"
                },
                "is_regular": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "`false` - ticket can be used on all sessions (one or more) e.g. One day show, Multi day conference `true` - ticket can be used once on any sessions e.g. Parks, museums, zoo"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "is_sold_out": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where all tickets sold out"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "session_count",
                "is_regular",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "is_sold_out"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_voucher_type": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event voucher type"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float price"
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "value": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float value of voucher"
                },
                "important_info": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "terms": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "is_price_hidden": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "show when price must be hidden"
                },
                "disclaimer_info": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "custom_title": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "max_usage_count_per_ticket": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "used only when **scanning_mode** is `false`. If `0` then voucher doesn't have usage limit. If `N` then voucher can use no more than `N` times."
                },
                "is_restrict_reactivation": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if `true` re-activating the scanned voucher is restrict."
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if scanning mode is `true`, voucher can be used only once."
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "price",
                "currency",
                "value",
                "is_price_hidden",
                "max_usage_count_per_ticket",
                "scanning_mode"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_ticket_template_config": {
          "type": "array"
        },
        "order": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of order"
                },
                "completed": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp when order was completed"
                },
                "comment": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "is_preprinted": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "extended_verification_code": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "is_delayed_delivery": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "purchased tickets will be sent to the user with some delay"
                },
                "ticket_waiting_text": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "expiration_datetime": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp when order expires"
                },
                "amount": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "order amount"
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "order currency"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "completed",
                    "expired",
                    "pending payment"
                  ],
                  "description": "order status"
                },
                "is_white_label": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "sale_integration": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "timezone": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "payment_type": {
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "completed",
                "comment",
                "is_preprinted",
                "expiration_datetime",
                "amount",
                "currency",
                "status",
                "is_white_label",
                "timezone"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "customer_fields": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "ident",
        "price",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias",
        "usage_updated",
        "valid_until"
      ]
    }

Event voucher
GET/event-vouchers/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-vouchers

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/2048?scope=use.event-vouchers&include=references%2Corder%2Corder.user,event_ticket_template_config"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 2048,
    "price": 100,
    "ident": "1332449-96572441102538514",
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "usage_updated": 1490782746,
    "valid_until": 1558515840,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 12622,
      "order": 1332449,
      "event_voucher_type": 65,
      "event_offer": 143
    },
    "order": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1332449,
        "completed": 1463408233,
        "comment": "",
        "is_preprinted": false,
        "extended_verification_code": "",
        "is_delayed_delivery": false,
        "ticket_waiting_text" : "",
        "user": {
          "data": {
            "id": 78374,
            "name": "Paul Macys",
            "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
            "phone": "+971529061101"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "event_ticket_template_config": {
      "data": {
        "online": {
          "regular": "{\"width\":793.7007,\"height\":1122.5196,\"elements\":[]}",
          "boca": null
        },
        "pre-printing": {
          "regular": "{\"width\":793.7007,\"height\":1122.5196,\"elements\":[]}",
          "boca": null
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

or

{
  "data": {
    "id": 2048,
    "price": 100,
    "ident": "",
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "",
    "usage_updated": 1490782746,
    "valid_until": 1558515840,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 12622,
      "order": 1332449,
      "event_voucher_type": 65,
      "event_offer": 143
    },
    "order": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1332449,
        "completed": 1463408233,
        "comment": "",
        "is_preprinted": false,
        "extended_verification_code": "",
        "is_delayed_delivery": false,
        "ticket_waiting_text" : "",
        "user": {
          "data": {
            "id": 78374,
            "name": "Paul Macys",
            "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
            "phone": "+971529061101"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Modify voucher ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/id
RequestsValidateDevalidate
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "use.event-vouchers",
  "operation": "validate",
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "operation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid operation"
    },
    "collector_alias": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "collector alias"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "operation"
  ]
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "ident": "1234-567890123",
    "price": 1000,
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "usage_updated": 1445507578,
    "valid_until": 1558515840,
    "usage_summary": 1
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Hello, world!"
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event voucher"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if voucher was uploaded by organiser"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "usage_updated": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of last usage change"
        },
        "valid_until": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "vouchers valid timestamp"
        },
        "usage_summary": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "voucher usage summary"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "ident",
        "price",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias",
        "usage_updated",
        "valid_until"
      ]
    },
    "meta": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "status": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "success",
            "failed"
          ]
        },
        "message": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "error message when failed"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "status"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "use.event-vouchers",
  "operation": "devalidate",
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "operation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid operation"
    },
    "collector_alias": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "collector alias"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "operation"
  ]
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "ident": "1234-567890123",
    "price": 1000,
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "usage_updated": 1445507578,
    "valid_until": 1558515840,
    "usage_summary": 1
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Hello, world!"
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event voucher"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if voucher was uploaded by organiser"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "usage_updated": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of last usage change"
        },
        "valid_until": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "vouchers valid timestamp"
        },
        "usage_summary": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "voucher usage summary"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "ident",
        "price",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias",
        "usage_updated",
        "valid_until"
      ]
    },
    "meta": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "status": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "success",
            "failed"
          ]
        },
        "message": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "error message when failed"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "status"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Modify voucher
PATCH/event-vouchers/{id}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-vouchers

Validate ¶

Validate voucher and mark it as used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.event-vouchers

  • operation string (required) - validate

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

  • usage_updated string (optional) - operation timestamp, format Y-m-d H:i:s

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope":"use.event-vouchers",
  "operation":"validate",
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/2048"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 2048,
    "price": 100,
    "ident": "1332449-96572441102538514",
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "usage_updated": 1490782746
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}

Devalidate ¶

Validate voucher and mark it as not used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.event-vouchers

  • operation string (required) - devalidate

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

  • usage_updated string (optional) - operation timestamp, format Y-m-d H:i:s

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope":"use.event-vouchers",
  "operation":"devalidate",
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/2048"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 2048,
    "price": 100,
    "ident": "1332449-96572441102538514",
    "is_used": false,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "usage_updated": 1490782668
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event voucher id

Batch modify vouchers ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
        "transactional": false,
        "data": [
            {
                "scope": "use.event-vouchers",
                "operation": "validate",
                "event_session.id": 12,
                "collector_alias": "Bob",
                "ident": "1332449-96572441102538514"
                "id": 1,
            },
            {
                "scope": "use.event-vouchers",
                "operation": "devalidate",
                "event_session.id": 13,
                "ident": "1332449-96572441102538518"
                "id": 2,
            }
        ]
    }
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "transactional": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "default `false`"
    },
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id": 1,
      "ident": "124345",
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_updated": 1234567
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "Event voucher not found"
  }
]
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "array"
}

Batch modify vouchers
PATCH/event-vouchers

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-vouchers

Body parameters:

  • transactional bool (optional, default false) - determine how operations will be processed:

    • true - if any operation generates an error then all operations are not processed
    • false - each operation is processed separately

  • data array (required) - array of patch operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the patching of a single voucher plus you must pass id or ident of voucher

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "transactional":true,
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "use.event-vouchers",
      "operation": "validate",
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "id": 2048
    },
    {
      "scope": "use.event-vouchers",
      "operation": "devalidate",
      "ident": "1332449-96572441102538518"
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers"

Response

[
  {
    "status": "failed",
    "message": "Voucher is already validated",
    "data": {
      "id": 2048,
      "price": 100,
      "ident": "1332449-96572441102538514",
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_updated": 1490782746
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id": 2052,
      "price": 100,
      "ident": "1332449-96572441102538518",
      "is_used": false,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_updated": 1490782887
    }
  }
]

Event voucher usage log list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/id/usage-logs?scope&user.id&used_from&used_to&is_used&collector_alias
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "timestamp": 1445507578,
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "references": {
      "event_voucher": 1,
      "user": 1
    },
    "event_voucher": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "ident": "1234-567890123",
        "price": 1000,
        "is_used": true,
        "collector_alias": "Bob",
        "usage_updated": 1445507578,
        "valid_until": 1558515840,
        "usage_summary": 1
      }
    },
    "collector": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Smith",
        "email": "foo@example.com",
        "phone": "+971501234567"
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event voucher usage"
        },
        "timestamp": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of used datetime"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "is used status"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_voucher": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event voucher"
            },
            "user": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of user who last used voucher"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_voucher",
            "user"
          ]
        },
        "event_voucher": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event voucher"
                },
                "ident": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if voucher was uploaded by organiser"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float price"
                },
                "is_used": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "collector_alias": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "collector alias"
                },
                "usage_updated": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of last usage change"
                },
                "valid_until": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "vouchers valid timestamp"
                },
                "usage_summary": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "voucher usage summary"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "ident",
                "price",
                "is_used",
                "collector_alias",
                "usage_updated",
                "valid_until"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "collector": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of user"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "user full user"
                },
                "email": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "email"
                },
                "phone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "phone"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "email",
                "phone"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "timestamp",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event voucher usage log list
GET/event-vouchers/{id}/usage-logs?{scope,user.id,used_from,used_to,is_used,collector_alias}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-vouchers

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • user

  • event_voucher

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/262535/usage-logs?scope=use.event-vouchers&include=user"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 224,
      "timestamp": 1504880710,
      "is_used": false,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 223,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 21574,
      "count": 100,
      "per_page": 100,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 216,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/262535/usage-logs?scope=use.event-vouchers&include=user&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event voucher id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

user.id
string (optional) 

filtering by user id

used_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

used_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

is_used
number (optional) 

filtering by is used status

collector_alias
string (optional) 

collector alias

  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Company",

      "target": "offer",
      "is_required": false,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "filling_time": "scanning",
      "type_options": {
        "text_is_multi_line": 0,
        "text_max_fields_count": 1,
        "text_max_length": 100,
        "text_validator": "email",
        "upload_max_file_size": 2048,
        "upload_image_min_width": 0,
        "upload_image_min_height": 0,
        "upload_image_max_width": 0,
        "upload_image_max_height": 0,

        "disclaimer_url": "terms url",

        "date_max": "2017",

        "choice_max_selected_options_count": 2,

        "choice_is_custom_value_shared": 1

    "message": "Event voucher does not have customer fields",
    "code": "103"

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • event_customer_field

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/236/customer-fields?scope=print.badges"

      "id_event_voucher": 236,

      "value": "General"
    },
    {
      "id_event_voucher": 236,
      "id_event_customer_field": 2,
      "value": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/order-customer-files/69_1b464cad9ad251d89a4747112f047392-0.png",
          "width": 1024,
          "height": 1024
      }
    }
  ]
}

      "id_order": 53689,
      "id_event_customer_field": 2,
      "value": "Company",
      "update_datetime": "2018"
    }
  ]

Voucher customer field
GET/event-vouchers/{id}/customer-fields/{idEventCustomerField}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • event_customer_field

EXAMPLE ¶

Returns customer fields with target type voucher only

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/236/customer-fields/1?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id_event_voucher": 236,
        "id_event_customer_field": 1,
        "value": "Custom text"
    }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event voucher id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

idEventCustomerField
int (required) 

event customer field id

Add or replace customer field ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/id/customer-fields
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": [
    "example string"
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "`print.badges`"
    },
    "id_event_customer_field": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "event customer field id"
    },
    "value": {
      "type": "array",
      "description": "customer field value"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "id_event_customer_field"
  ]
}
Responses200400400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id_event_voucher": 236,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": "example string"
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": "104"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid value for customer field",
    "code": 300,
    "invalid_fields": {
      "value": {
        "errorCode": "errorMessage"
      }
    }
  }
}

Add or replace customer field
POST/event-vouchers/{id}/customer-fields

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Add or replace value in voucher customer field by event customer field id

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - print.badges

  • id_event_customer_field number (required) - event customer field id

  • value string or array (optional, nullable) - customer field value

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": [
    "example string"
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/236/customer-fields"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id_event_voucher": 236,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": [
      "example string"
    ]
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event voucher id

Batch voucher customer fields ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/id/customer-fields/batch
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  }
]

Batch voucher customer fields
POST/event-vouchers/{id}/customer-fields/batch

Caution ¶

For upload image use header Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Body parameters:

  • data array (required) - array of add operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the adding of a single customer field plus you must pass id_event_customer_filed of event customer field

Example ¶

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/1868/customer-fields/batch"

or

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-F "data[0][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[0][id_event_customer_field]=3" -F "data[0][value]=2001-12-29" \
-F "data[1][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[1][id_event_customer_field]=20" -F "data[1][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[2][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[2][id_event_customer_field]=25" -F "data[2][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[3][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[3][id_event_customer_field]=32" -F "data[3][value]=1970-01-01" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-vouchers/1868/customer-fields/batch"

Response

[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_voucher": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32, 
      "value": "1970-01-01",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  }
]
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event voucher id

Event season ticket ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_show

  • event_season_ticket_usages

  • event_season_ticket_type

  • event_ticket_template_config

  • order

  • seating_position

  • customer_fields

Event season ticket ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/id?scope
Responses200404404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "ident": "12345-67890123456",
    "price": 1000,
    "used_count": 3,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 1,
      "event_season_ticket_type": 1,
      "order": 1,
      "seating_position": 1,
      "event_offer": 1
    },
    "event_show": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "session_count": 3,
        "is_regular": true,
        "has_tickets": true,

        "is_sold_out": false

        "is_preprinted": true,
        "extended_verification_code": "Some text",

        "currency": "'AED'",
        "status": "completed",

      "data": {

        "place": "5"
      }

          "id_event_customer_field": 2,
          "value": "Company",
          "update_datetime": "2018"
        }
