Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event season ticket"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if season ticket was uploaded by organiser"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "used_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_show": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event show"
            },
            "event_season_ticket_type": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event season ticket type"
            },
            "order": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of order"
            },
            "seating_position": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "id of seating position"
            },
            "event_offer": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event offer"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_show",
            "event_season_ticket_type",
            "order",
            "seating_position",
            "event_offer"
          ]
        },
        "event_show": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event show"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "session_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "sessions count per show"
                },
                "is_regular": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "`false` - ticket can be used on all sessions (one or more) e.g. One day show, Multi day conference `true` - ticket can be used once on any sessions e.g. Parks, museums, zoo"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "is_sold_out": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where all tickets sold out"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "session_count",
                "is_regular",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "is_sold_out"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_season_ticket_usages": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_season_ticket_type": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event season ticket type"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float price"
                },
                "value": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float custom value"
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "important_info": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ]
                },
                "max_usage_count_per_ticket": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "used only when **scanning_mode** is `false`. If `0` then season ticket doesn't have usage limit per session. If `N` then season ticket can use no more than `N` times."
                },
                "is_restrict_reactivation": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if `true` re-activating the scanned season ticket is restrict."
                },
                "is_price_hidden": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "show when price must be hidden"
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if scanning mode is `true`, ticket can be used only once per session."
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "price",
                "value",
                "currency",
                "max_usage_count_per_ticket",
                "is_restrict_reactivation",
                "is_price_hidden",
                "scanning_mode"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_ticket_template_config": {
          "type": "array"
        },
        "order": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",

                  "type": "number",

                  "type": "number",

                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "completed",
                    "expired",
                    "pending payment"
                  ],
                  "description": "order status"
                },
                "is_white_label": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "sale_integration": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "timezone": {
                  "type": "string"

                "amount",

          "type": "object",

Event season ticket
GET/event-season-tickets/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/262535?scope=use.event-season-tickets&include=references%2Corder%2Corder.user%2Cseating_position,event_season_ticket_usages,event_ticket_template_config"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 262535,
    "price": 300,
    "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
    "used_count": 3,
    "references": {
      "event_show": 12622,
      "order": 62982,
      "event_season_ticket_type": 3278,
      "seating_position": 14863,
      "event_offer": 196
    },
    "order": {
      "data": {
        "id": 62982,
        "completed": 1366903516,
        "comment": "",
        "is_preprinted": false,
        "extended_verification_code": "",
        "is_delayed_delivery": false,
        "ticket_waiting_text" : "",
        "user": {
          "data": {
            "id": 66904,
            "name": "lolosh ololo",
            "email": "flex301@gmail.com",
            "phone": "+971520000002"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "event_season_ticket_usages": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 123,
          "timestamp": 1457946680,
          "is_used": true
        },
        {
          "id": 124,
          "timestamp": 1457946680,
          "is_used": false
        },
        ...
      ]
    },
    "seating_position": {
      "data": {
        "id": 14863,
        "row": "M",
        "place": "13"
      }
    },
    "event_ticket_template_config": {
      "data": {
        "online": {
          "regular": "{\"width\":793.7007,\"height\":1122.5196,\"elements\":[]}",
          "boca": null
        },
        "pre-printing": {
          "regular": "{\"width\":793.7007,\"height\":1122.5196,\"elements\":[]}",
          "boca": null
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Modify season ticket ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/id
RequestsValidateDevalidate

Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "use.event-season-tickets",
  "operation": "validate",
  "event_session.id": 13,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "operation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid operation"
    },
    "event_session.id": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "valid event session id"
    },
    "collector_alias": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "collector alias"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "operation",
    "event_session.id"
  ]
}
Responses200

    "id": 1,

    "used_count": 3

    "status": "success",
    "message": "Hello, world!"

            "failed"

      "type": "string",

    "id": 1,
    "ident": "12345-67890123456",

    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event season ticket"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if season ticket was uploaded by organiser"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "used_count": {
          "type": "number"

        "ident",
        "price",
        "used_count"
      ]
    },
    "meta": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "status": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "success",
            "failed"

Modify season ticket
PATCH/event-season-tickets/{id}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

Validate ¶

Validate season ticket and mark it as used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.event-season-tickets

  • operation string (required) - validate

  • event_session.id integer (required) - id of event session

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

  • usage_updated string (optional) - operation timestamp, format Y-m-d H:i:s

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "use.event-season-tickets",
  "operation": "validate",
  "event_session.id": 12,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/262535"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 262535,
    "price": 300,
    "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
    "used_count": 3
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}

Devalidate ¶

Validate season ticket and mark it as not used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.event-season-tickets

  • operation string (required) - devalidate

  • event_session.id number (required) - id of event session

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

  • usage_updated string (optional) - operation timestamp, format Y-m-d H:i:s

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "use.event-season-tickets",
  "operation": "devalidate",
  "event_session.id": 12,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/262535"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 262535,
    "price": 300,
    "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
    "used_count": 3
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event season ticket id

Batch modify season tickets ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
        "transactional": false,
        "data": [
            {
                "scope": "use.event-season-tickets",
                "operation": "validate",
                "event_session.id": 12,
                "collector_alias": "Bob",
                "ident": "11634-5B34FD49"
                "id": 1,
            },
            {
                "scope": "use.event-season-tickets",
                "operation": "devalidate",
                "event_session.id": 13,
                "ident": "11634-60BD772C"
                "id": 2,
            }
        ]
    }
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "transactional": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "default `false`"
    },
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id": 1,
      "ident": "124345",
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_updated": 1234567
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "Event ticket not found"
  }
]
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "array"
}

Batch modify season tickets
PATCH/event-season-tickets

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

Body parameters:

  • transactional bool (optional, default false) - determine how operations will be processed:

    • true - if any operation generates an error then all operations are not processed
    • false - each operation is processed separately

  • data array (required) - array of patch operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the patching of a single ticket plus you must pass id or ident of season ticket

Example ¶

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "transactional":true,
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "use.event-season-tickets",
      "operation": "validate",
      "event_session.id": 12,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "id": 262535
    },
    {
      "scope": "use.event-season-tickets",
      "operation": "devalidate",
      "event_session.id": "13",
      "ident": "11634-60BD772C"
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets"

Response

[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id": 262535,
      "price": 300,
      "ident": "11634-5B34FD49",
      "used_count": 3
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "failed",
    "message": "Season ticket is already reactivated",
    "data": {
      "id": 262536,
      "price": 300,
      "ident": "11634-60BD772C",
      "used_count": 3
    }
  }
]

Event season ticket usage list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/id/usages?scope&event_session.id&user.id&used_from&used_to&is_used&collector_alias
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "timestamp": 1445507578,
      "is_used": 1445518419,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_summary": 1
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event season ticket usage list
GET/event-season-tickets/{id}/usages?{scope,event_session.id,user.id,used_from,used_to,is_used,collector_alias}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • event_season_ticket

  • event_session

  • user

  • references

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/262535/usages?scope=use.event-season-tickets&include=references,event_ticket,event_session,user"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 223,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "distinctive_features": null,
      "references": {
        "event_season_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "user": 78374
      }, 
      "event_season_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "used_count": 3
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 12,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 224,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "",
      "distinctive_features": null,
      "references": {
        "event_season_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "collector": 1
      },
      "event_season_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "used_count": 3
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 14,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 21574,
      "count": 100,
      "per_page": 100,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 216,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-shows/12622/sessions?scope=use.event-season-tickets&include=references,event_show&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow

int (required) 

event season ticket id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

event_session.id
string (optional) 

filtering by event session id

user.id
string (optional) 

filtering by user id

used_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

used_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

is_used
number (optional) 

filtering by is used status

collector_alias
string (optional) 

collector alias

Event season ticket usage log list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/id/usage-logs?scope&event_session.id&user.id&used_from&used_to&is_used&collector_alias
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "timestamp": 1445507578,
    "is_used": true,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "references": {
      "event_season_ticket_usage": 1,
      "user": 1
    },
    "event_season_ticket_usage": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "timestamp": 1445507578,
        "is_used": 1445518419,
        "collector_alias": "Bob",
        "usage_summary": 1
      }
    },
    "collector": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Smith",
        "email": "foo@example.com",
        "phone": "+971501234567"
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event season ticket usage"
        },
        "timestamp": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of used datetime"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "is used status"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_season_ticket_usage": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event season ticket usage"
            },
            "user": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of user who last used season ticket"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_season_ticket_usage",
            "user"
          ]
        },
        "event_season_ticket_usage": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event season ticket usage"
                },
                "timestamp": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of used datetime"
                },
                "is_used": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "is used status"
                },
                "collector_alias": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "collector alias"
                },
                "usage_summary": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "season ticket usage summary per session"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "timestamp",
                "is_used",
                "collector_alias"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "collector": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of user"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "user full user"
                },
                "email": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "email"
                },
                "phone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "phone"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "email",
                "phone"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "timestamp",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event season ticket usage log list
GET/event-season-tickets/{id}/usage-logs?{scope,event_session.id,user.id,used_from,used_to,is_used,collector_alias}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • user

  • event_season_ticket_usage

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/262535/usage-logs?scope=use.event-season-tickets&include=user"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 224,
      "timestamp": 1504880710,
      "is_used": false,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 223,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 21574,
      "count": 100,
      "per_page": 100,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 216,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/262535/usage-logs?scope=use.event-season-tickets&include=user&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}

Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Company",
      "type": "text",
      "description": "null",
      "target": "offer",
      "is_required": false,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "filling_time": "scanning",
      "type_options": {
        "text_is_multi_line": 0,
        "text_max_fields_count": 1,
        "text_max_length": 100,
        "text_validator": "email",
        "upload_max_file_size": 2048,
        "upload_image_min_width": 0,
        "upload_image_min_height": 0,
        "upload_image_max_width": 0,
        "upload_image_max_height": 0,
        "disclaimer_label": "a little bit text",
        "disclaimer_url": "terms url",
        "date_min": "2017",
        "date_max": "2017",
        "choice_style": "checkbox/dropdown",
        "choice_max_selected_options_count": 2,
        "choice_options": [],
        "choice_is_custom_value_allowed": 1,
        "choice_is_custom_value_shared": 1
      }
    }
  ]
}

  "type": "object",

      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event season ticket does not have customer fields",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Season ticket's customer field list
GET/event-season-tickets/{id}/customer-fields?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • event_customer_field

Example ¶

Returns customer fields with target type ticket only

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/1868/customer-fields?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 1,
      "value": "General"
    },
    {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 2,
      "value": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/order-customer-files/69_1b464cad9ad251d89a4747112f047392-0.png",
          "width": 1024,
          "height": 1024
      }
    }
  ]
}

int (required)

      "id_event_ticket": 1869,
      "id_event_voucher": 236,
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1834,
      "id_order": 53689,
      "id_event_customer_field": 2,
      "value": "Company",
      "update_datetime": "2018"
    }
  ]
}

  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",

      "type": "array"

  }

    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": "104"

Season ticket customer field
GET/event-season-tickets/{id}/customer-fields/{idEventCustomerField}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/1868/customer-fields/1?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
        "id_event_customer_field": 1,
        "value": "Custom text"
    }
}
URI Parameters

int (required)

string (required) 

valid scope

idEventCustomerField

event customer field id

Add or replace customer field ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/id/customer-fields
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": "example string"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "`print.badges`"
    },
    "id_event_customer_field": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "event customer field id"
    },
    "value": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "customer field value"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "id_event_customer_field",
    "value"
  ]
}
Responses200400400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": "example string"
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": "104"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid value for customer field",
    "code": 300,
    "invalid_fields": {
      "value": {
        "errorCode": "errorMessage"
      }
    }
  }
}

Add or replace customer field
POST/event-season-tickets/{id}/customer-fields

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Add or replace value in ticket customer field by event customer field id

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - print.badges

  • id_event_customer_field number (required) - event customer field id

  • value string or array (optional, nullable) - customer field value

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": "example string"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/1868/customer-fields"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": "example string"
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event season ticket id

Batch season ticket customer fields ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/id/customer-fields/batch
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Responses200400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  }
]
Headers
Content-Type: application/json

Batch season ticket customer fields
POST/event-season-tickets/{id}/customer-fields/batch

Caution ¶

For upload image use header Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Body parameters:

  • data array (required) - array of add operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the adding of a single customer field plus you must pass id_event_customer_filed of event customer field

Example ¶

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/1868/customer-fields/batch"

or

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-F "data[0][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[0][id_event_customer_field]=3" -F "data[0][value]=2001-12-29" \
-F "data[1][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[1][id_event_customer_field]=20" -F "data[1][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[2][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[2][id_event_customer_field]=25" -F "data[2][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[3][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[3][id_event_customer_field]=32" -F "data[3][value]=1970-01-01" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-tickets/1868/customer-fields/batch"

Response

[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_event_season_ticket": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32, 
      "value": "1970-01-01",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  }
]
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event season ticket id

Event season ticket usage ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • event_season_ticket

  • event_session

  • user

  • references

Event ticket usage list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-ticket-usages?scope&event_session.id&user.id&used_from&used_to&is_used&collector_alias
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "timestamp": 1445507578,
      "is_used": 1445518419,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_summary": 1,
      "references": {
        "event_season_ticket": 1,
        "event_session": 1,
        "user": 1
      },
      "event_season_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 1,
          "ident": "12345-67890123456",
          "price": 1000,
          "used_count": 3
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 1,
          "start": 1445507578,
          "end": 1445518419,
          "performance_beginning": 1445518419,
          "distinctive_features": "Line up"
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "John Smith",
          "email": "foo@example.com",
          "phone": "+971501234567",
          "gender": "m",
          "birthday": "1988-02-15",
          "is_closed": false,
          "is_blocked": false
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Event ticket usage list
GET/event-season-ticket-usages?{scope,event_session.id,user.id,used_from,used_to,is_used,collector_alias}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-ticket-usages?scope=partner-sale.event-season-tickets&include=references,event_season_ticket,event_session,user"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 223,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_summary": 1,
      "references": {
        "event_season_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "user": 78374
      }, 
      "event_season_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "used_count": 3
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 12,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "session_count": 3,
          "type": "common",
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 224,
      "timestamp": 1504880700,
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "",
      "usage_summary": 1,
      "references": {
        "event_season_ticket": 262535,
        "event_session": 12,
        "collector": 1
      },
      "event_season_ticket": {
        "data": {
          "id": 262535,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "502-24776126316413104",
          "used_count": 3
        }
      },
      "event_session": {
        "data": {
          "id": 14,
          "start": 1477418400,
          "end": 1478383140,
          "session_count": 3,
          "type": "common",
          "performance_beginning": null,
          "distinctive_features": null
        }
      },
      "user": {
        "data": {
          "id": 78374,
          "name": "Paul Macys",
          "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
          "phone": "+971529061101"
        }
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 1356,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 136,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-sessions?scope=partner-sale.event-season-tickets&include=event&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

event_session.id
string (optional) 

filtering by event session id

user.id
string (optional) 

filtering by user id

used_from
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

used_to
number (optional) 

timestamp for filtering usages by used date start

is_used
number (optional) 

filtering by is used status

collector_alias
string (optional) 

collector alias

Event season ticket usage ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-ticket-usages/id?scope
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "timestamp": 1445507578,
    "is_used": 1445518419,
    "collector_alias": "Bob",
    "usage_summary": 1,
    "references": {
      "event_season_ticket": 1,
      "event_session": 1,
      "user": 1
    },
    "event_season_ticket": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "ident": "12345-67890123456",
        "price": 1000,
        "used_count": 3
      }
    },
    "event_session": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "performance_beginning": 1445518419,
        "distinctive_features": "Line up"
      }
    },
    "user": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Smith",
        "email": "foo@example.com",
        "phone": "+971501234567",
        "gender": "m",
        "birthday": "1988-02-15",
        "is_closed": false,
        "is_blocked": false
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event season ticket usage"
        },
        "timestamp": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of used datetime"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "is used status"
        },
        "collector_alias": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "collector alias"
        },
        "usage_summary": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "season ticket usage summary per session"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_season_ticket": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event season ticket"
            },
            "event_session": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event session"
            },
            "user": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of user who last used season ticket"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_season_ticket",
            "event_session",
            "user"
          ]
        },
        "event_season_ticket": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event season ticket"
                },
                "ident": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "empty, if order in delayed delivery mode, or if season ticket was uploaded by organiser"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float price"
                },
                "used_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "ident",
                "price",
                "used_count"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "event_session": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event session"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time (doors open)"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "performance_beginning": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time"
                },
                "distinctive_features": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "event session distinctive features"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "start",
                "end",
                "performance_beginning"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "user": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of user"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "user full name"
                },
                "email": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "email"
                },
                "phone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "phone"
                },
                "gender": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "enum": [
                    "m",
                    "f",
                    null
                  ],
                  "description": "gender"
                },
                "birthday": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "birth date"
                },
                "is_closed": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account closed"
                },
                "is_blocked": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account blocked"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "email",
                "phone",
                "gender",
                "birthday",
                "is_closed",
                "is_blocked"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "timestamp",
        "is_used",
        "collector_alias"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event season ticket usage not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event season ticket usage
GET/event-season-ticket-usages/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-season-ticket-usages/14?scope=partner-sale.event-season-tickets&include=references,event_season_ticket,event_session,user"

Response

{
  "id": 224,
  "timestamp": 1504880700,
  "is_used": true,
  "collector_alias": "Bob",
  "usage_summary": 2,
  "references": {
    "event_ticket": 262535,
    "event_session": 12,
    "collector": 1
  },
  "event_season_ticket": {
    "data": {
      "id": 262535,
      "price": 99.95,
      "ident": "502-24776126316413104"
      "used_count": 3
    }
  },
  "event_session": {
    "data": {
      "id": 14,
      "start": 1477418400,
      "end": 1478383140,
      "performance_beginning": null,
      "distinctive_features": null
    }
  },
  "user": {
    "data": {
      "id": 78374,
      "name": "Paul Macys",
      "email": "paul@platinumlist.net",
      "phone": "+971529061101"
    }
  }
}

Event badge layouts
GET/event-badge-layouts/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Field types:

  • empty string (nullable) - empty field;

  • text string (required) - text entered by organiser;

  • image - uploaded by organiser

  • platinumlist logo - logo platinumlist. Type svg;

  • event name string - event name;

  • show date string - event show start date;

  • map zone - event map zone name, gets by ticket type Event Map Zone;

  • ticket type - event ticket type name, gets from ticket Event ticket;

  • user name - this field you can get from EVENT CUSTOMER FIELDS by type name and target ticket or by fallback from order with user includes

  • user email - this field you can get from EVENT CUSTOMER FIELDS by type email and target ticket or by fallback from order with user includes

  • user city - user city. Get from User references;

  • user avatar - user image;

  • customer field - field customisation. Event customer fields;

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-badge-layouts/75?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 75,
        "position1": {
            "type": "platinumlist logo",
            "value": {
              "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/svg-icons/pl-logo.svg",
              "width": null,
              "height": null
            },
            "id_event_customer_field": 0,
            "font_style": "regular",
            "font_size": 0.4,
            "max_line_count": 1,
            "text_overflow": "trim"
        },
        "position2": {
            "type": "text",
            "value": "Constant text",
            "id_event_customer_field": 0,
            "font_style": "regular",
            "font_size": 0.4,
            "max_line_count": 1,
            "text_overflow": "trim"
        },
        "position3": {
            "type": "customer field",
            "value": null,
            "id_event_customer_field": 677,
            "font_style": "regular",
            "font_size": 0.4,
            "max_line_count": 1,
            "text_overflow": "trim"
        },
        "position4": {
            "type": "customer field",
            "value": null,
            "id_event_customer_field": 678,
            "font_style": "regular",
            "font_size": 0.4,
            "max_line_count": 1,
            "text_overflow": "trim"
        },
        "position5": {
            "type": "customer field",
            "value": null,
            "id_event_customer_field": 679,
            "font_style": "regular",
            "font_size": 0.4,
            "max_line_count": 1,
            "text_overflow": "trim"
        }
    }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event badge layout id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

    "id": 1,
    "image": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
      "width": 1,
      "height": 1
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event wristband layout"
        },
        "image": {
          "type": [
            "object",
            "null"
          ],
          "properties": {
            "src": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "link to image"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image width"
            },
            "height": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image height"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "src",
            "width",
            "height"
          ],
          "description": "link to image"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "image"
      ]
    }
  }
}

            "height": 100

Event customer fields ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-customer-fields/id?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Company",
    "type": "text",
    "description": "null",
    "target": "offer",
    "is_required": false,
    "is_enabled": true,
    "filling_time": "scanning",
    "type_options": {
      "text_is_multi_line": 0,
      "text_max_fields_count": 1,
      "text_max_length": 100,
      "text_validator": "email",
      "upload_max_file_size": 2048,
      "upload_image_min_width": 0,
      "upload_image_min_height": 0,
      "upload_image_max_width": 0,
      "upload_image_max_height": 0,
      "disclaimer_label": "a little bit text",
      "disclaimer_url": "terms url",
      "date_min": "2017",
      "date_max": "2017",
      "choice_style": "checkbox/dropdown",
      "choice_max_selected_options_count": 2,
      "choice_options": [],
      "choice_is_custom_value_allowed": 1,
      "choice_is_custom_value_shared": 1
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event customer field"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "field name"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "element type"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "description about field"
        },
        "target": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "dependence from"
        },
        "is_required": {
          "type": [
            "boolean",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "need to fill"
        },
        "is_enabled": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "event customer field status"
        },
        "filling_time": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "If \"scanning\" checked, customer field can not be required"
        },
        "type_options": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "text_is_multi_line": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "field text type. Type \"Single line\" - equal HTML element input. Type \"Multi line\" - textarea"
            },
            "text_max_fields_count": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "max field count for type \"Single line\""
            },
            "text_max_length": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "max text length for one field"
            },
            "text_validator": {
              "type": [
                "string",
                "null"
              ],
              "enum": [
                "email",
                "name",
                "phone",
                null
              ],
              "description": "validator's name for text"
            },
            "upload_max_file_size": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "max file size in KB"
            },
            "upload_image_min_width": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "min image width"
            },
            "upload_image_min_height": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "min image height"
            },
            "upload_image_max_width": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "max image width"
            },
            "upload_image_max_height": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "max image height"
            },
            "disclaimer_label": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "text field of information character"
            },
            "disclaimer_url": {
              "type": [
                "string",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "leads to the terms and conditions page"
            },
            "date_min": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "08-01 (string, required) - min value for date"
            },
            "date_max": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "08-01 (string, required) - max value for date"
            },
            "choice_style": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "choice style"
            },
            "choice_max_selected_options_count": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "max options count"
            },
            "choice_options": {
              "type": "array"
            },
            "choice_is_custom_value_allowed": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "allow users to enter their values"
            },
            "choice_is_custom_value_shared": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "allow users to see values entered by other users"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "text_is_multi_line",
            "text_max_fields_count",
            "text_max_length",
            "upload_max_file_size",
            "disclaimer_label",
            "choice_style",
            "choice_max_selected_options_count",
            "choice_options",
            "choice_is_custom_value_allowed",
            "choice_is_custom_value_shared"
          ]
        },
        "parent_id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "id of parent customer field."
        },
        "parent_value": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "value of parent option."
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "type",
        "target",
        "is_enabled",
        "filling_time",
        "type_options"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event customer fields
GET/event-customer-fields/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Field type:

  • text

  • choice

  • upload

  • date

  • disclaimer

  • email - moved from Event ticket

  • name - moved from Event ticket

  • phone - moved from Event ticket

Add new field target. Contain dependence name:

  • ticket - dependence from Event ticket customer field

  • voucher - dependence from Event voucher customer field

  • offer - dependence from Order customer field

Add new optional field parent_id. Contain id of parent customer field.

Add new optional field parent_value. Contains value of parent option from parent “customer field”.

Some customer fields with type=choice can have dependant customer fields that are displayed depending on the value of the selected option. In this case, the child customer field has the parent_id and parent_value parameters.

Customer fields with type=text have text_validator with validator’s name.

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-customer-fields/1?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Company",
    "type": "text",
    "description": null,
    "is_required": true,
    "is_enabled": true,
    "target": "offer",
    "filling_time": "checkout",
    "type_options": {
      "text_is_multi_line": 0,
      "text_max_fields_count": 1,
      "text_max_length": 100,
      "text_validator" : "name"
    },
    "parent_id": 4,
    "parent_value": "Willy"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event customer field id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Event deliveries ¶

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event

  • event_delivery_options

Event delivery ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-deliveries/?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Delivery name",
    "description": "Info",
    "items_per_package": 1,
    "options_title": "Options title",
    "options_style": "select",
    "is_self_pickup": true,
    "is_enabled": false,
    "is_default": true
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event delivery"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "items_per_package": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "options_title": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "options_style": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "'select' or 'radio'"
        },
        "is_self_pickup": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "is_enabled": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "is_default": {
          "type": "boolean"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "description",
        "items_per_package",
        "options_title",
        "options_style",
        "is_self_pickup",
        "is_enabled",
        "is_default"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event delivery
GET/event-deliveries/?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-deliveries/1?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references,event_delivery_options"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "test delivery",
    "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae",
    "items_per_package": 1,
    "options_title": "test options title",
    "options_style": "select",
    "is_self_pickup": false,
    "is_enabled": true,
    "is_default": true,
    "references": {
      "event": 667
    },
    "event_delivery_options": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "option",
          "package_price": 10,
          "is_enabled": true
        },
        {
          "id": 2,
          "name": "option 2",
          "package_price": 20,
          "is_enabled": true
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Headers

Body

  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Option name",
      "package_price": 50,
      "is_enabled": true
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event delivery does not have delivery options",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Event's delivery options list
GET/event-deliveries/{id}/options?{scope,search,is_enabled}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_delivery

Available sorts:

  • search - default

  • is_enabled

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-deliveries/1/options?scope=use.event-tickets&include=event_delivery,references"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "option",
      "package_price": 10,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "references": {
        "event_delivery": 1
      },
      "event_delivery": {
        "data": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "test delivery",
          "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae",
          "items_per_package": 1,
          "options_title": "test options title",
          "options_style": "select",
          "is_self_pickup": false,
          "is_enabled": true,
          "is_default": true
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "option 2",
      "package_price": 20,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "references": {
        "event_delivery": 1
      },
      "event_delivery": {
        "data": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "test delivery",
          "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae",
          "items_per_package": 1,
          "options_title": "test options title",
          "options_style": "select",
          "is_self_pickup": false,
          "is_enabled": true,
          "is_default": true
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 2,
      "count": 2,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 1,
      "links": []
    }
  }
}

Headers

  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Option name",
    "package_price": 50,
    "is_enabled": true
  }
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event delivery option"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "package_price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"

        "is_enabled": {
          "type": "boolean"
        }

        "package_price",
        "is_enabled"

    "message": "Event delivery option does not exists",
    "code": "103"
  }

Event's delivery options

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-delivery-options/1?scope=use.event-tickets&include=event_delivery,references"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "option",
    "package_price": 10,
    "is_enabled": true,
    "references": {
      "event_delivery": 1
    },
    "event_delivery": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "test delivery",
        "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae",
        "items_per_package": 1,
        "options_title": "test options title",
        "options_style": "select",
        "is_self_pickup": false,
        "is_enabled": true,
        "is_default": true
      }
    }
  }

Event show stats ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/collection-agents/me/event-show-stats/idEventShow?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "tickets": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    },
    "vouchers": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    },
    "season": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    },
    "upsells": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    },
    "references": {
      "event_show": 1
    },
    "total": {
      "tickets": {
        "used_count": 100,
        "unique_scan_count": 100,
        "revalidated_count": 100,
        "sold_count": 100
      },
      "vouchers": {
        "used_count": 100,
        "unique_scan_count": 100,
        "revalidated_count": 100,
        "sold_count": 100
      },
      "season": {
        "used_count": 100,
        "unique_scan_count": 100,
        "revalidated_count": 100,
        "sold_count": 100
      },
      "upsells": {
        "used_count": 100,
        "unique_scan_count": 100,
        "revalidated_count": 100,
        "sold_count": 100
      }
    }
  }
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "tickets": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "used_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "unique_scan_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "used_count",
            "unique_scan_count",
            "revalidated_count"
          ]
        },
        "vouchers": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "used_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "unique_scan_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "used_count",
            "unique_scan_count",
            "revalidated_count"
          ]
        },
        "season": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "used_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "unique_scan_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "used_count",
            "unique_scan_count",
            "revalidated_count"
          ],
          "description": "tickets (object)"
        },
        "upsells": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "used_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "unique_scan_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "used_count",
            "unique_scan_count",
            "revalidated_count"
          ]
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_show": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event show"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_show"
          ]
        },
        "total": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "tickets": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "used_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                },
                "unique_scan_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                },
                "revalidated_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                },
                "sold_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "used_count",
                "unique_scan_count",
                "revalidated_count",
                "sold_count"
              ]
            },
            "vouchers": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "used_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                },
                "unique_scan_count": {
                  "type": "number"

                "revalidated_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                },
                "sold_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "used_count",
                "unique_scan_count",
                "revalidated_count",
                "sold_count"
              ]
            },
            "season": {
              "type": "object",

                "used_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                },
                "unique_scan_count": {
                  "type": "number"

                  "type": "number"

                "sold_count": {
                  "type": "number"
                }
              },

                "used_count",

                "revalidated_count",
                "sold_count"
              ],
              "description": "tickets (object)"
            },
            "upsells": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "used_count": {
                  "type": "number"

                  "type": "number"

                  "type": "number"

                "unique_scan_count",
                "revalidated_count",
                "sold_count"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Event show stats
GET/collection-agents/{id}/event-show-stats/{idEventShow}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • collection-agent-stats.events

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \ 
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/collection-agents/me/event-show-stats/12622?scope=collection-agent-stats.events&include=total"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "tickets": {
      "used_count": 75,
      "unique_scan_count": 20,
      "revalidated_count": 15
    },
    "vouchers": {
      "used_count": 0,
      "unique_scan_count": 0,
      "revalidated_count": 0
    },
    "season-tickets": {
      "used_count": 75,
      "unique_scan_count": 20,
      "revalidated_count": 15
    },
    "upsells": {
      "used_count": 25,
      "unique_scan_count": 10,
      "revalidated_count": 5
    },
    "total": {
      "data": {
        "tickets": {
          "used_count": 540,
          "unique_scan_count": 592,
          "revalidated_count": 443,
          "sold_count": 500
        },
        "vouchers": {
          "used_count": 124,
          "unique_scan_count": 235,
          "revalidated_count": 13,
          "sold_count": 500
        },
         "season-tickets": {
          "used_count": 540,
          "unique_scan_count": 592,
          "revalidated_count": 443,
          "sold_count": 845
        },
        "upsells": {
          "used_count": 440,
          "unique_scan_count": 390,
          "revalidated_count": 400,
          "sold_count": 700
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int|string (required) Example: me

collection agent id or reserved word me

idEventShow
int (required) 

id of event show

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Modify event show stats ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/collection-agents/me/event-show-stats/idEventShow
RequestsIncrease
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "collection-agent-stats.events",
  "operation": "increase",
  "include": "total",
  "tickets": {
    "used_count": 5,
    "unique_scan_count": 5,
    "revalidated_count": 5
  },
  "vouchers": {
    "used_count": 5,
    "unique_scan_count": 5,
    "revalidated_count": 5
  },
  "season": {
    "used_count": 5,
    "unique_scan_count": 5,
    "revalidated_count": 5
  },
  "upsells": {
    "used_count": 5,
    "unique_scan_count": 5,
    "revalidated_count": 5
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "operation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid operation"
    },
    "include": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "tickets": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "used_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "unique_scan_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "revalidated_count": {
          "type": "number"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "used_count",
        "unique_scan_count",
        "revalidated_count"
      ],
      "description": "tickets increase data"
    },
    "vouchers": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "used_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "unique_scan_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "revalidated_count": {
          "type": "number"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "used_count",
        "unique_scan_count",
        "revalidated_count"
      ],
      "description": "vouchers increase data"
    },
    "season": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "used_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "unique_scan_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "revalidated_count": {
          "type": "number"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "used_count",
        "unique_scan_count",
        "revalidated_count"
      ],
      "description": "tickets (object, optional) - season tickets increase data"
    },
    "upsells": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "used_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "unique_scan_count": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "revalidated_count": {
          "type": "number"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "used_count",
        "unique_scan_count",
        "revalidated_count"
      ],
      "description": "upsells increase data"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "operation"
  ]
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "tickets": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    },
    "vouchers": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    },
    "season": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    },
    "upsells": {
      "used_count": 100,
      "unique_scan_count": 100,
      "revalidated_count": 100
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "tickets": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "used_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "unique_scan_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "used_count",
            "unique_scan_count",
            "revalidated_count"
          ]
        },
        "vouchers": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "used_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "unique_scan_count": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"

            "used_count",
            "unique_scan_count",
            "revalidated_count"

              "type": "number"
            },

              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"

              "type": "number"

              "type": "number"
            },
            "revalidated_count": {
              "type": "number"
            }
          },

            "used_count",
            "unique_scan_count",
            "revalidated_count"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "meta": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "status": {
          "type": "string",

            "success",
            "failed"
          ]
        }
      },
      "required": [
