      ]
    }
  }
}

Modify event show stats
PATCH/collection-agents/{id}/event-show-stats/{idEventShow}

Valid scopes:

  • collection-agent-stats.events

Increase ¶

Increase collection agent stats

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - collection-agent-stats.events

  • operation string (required) - increase

  • include string (optional) - resources to include in result

  • tickets object (optional) - required if no tickets increasing data

    • used_count int (required) - value to increase

    • unique_scan_count int (required) - value to increase

    • revalidated_count int (required) - value to increase

  • vouchers object (optional) - required if no vouchers increasing data

    • used_count int (required) - value to increase

    • unique_scan_count int (required) - value to increase

    • revalidated_count int (required) - value to increase

  • season-tickets object (optional) - required if no season tickets increasing data

    • used_count int (required) - value to increase

    • unique_scan_count int (required) - value to increase

    • revalidated_count int (required) - value to increase

  • upsells object (optional) - required if no upsells increasing data

    • used_count int (required) - value to increase

    • unique_scan_count int (required) - value to increase

    • revalidated_count int (required) - value to increase

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope":"collection-agent-stats.events",
  "operation":"increase",
  "include":"total",
  "tickets": {
    "used_count": 1,
    "unique_scan_count": 2,
    "revalidated_count": 0
  }
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/collection-agents/me/event-show-stats/12622?scope=collection-agent-stats.events&include=total"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "tickets": {
      "used_count": 76,
      "unique_scan_count": 22,
      "revalidated_count": 15
    },
    "vouchers": {
      "used_count": 0,
      "unique_scan_count": 0,
      "revalidated_count": 0
    },
    "season-tickets": {
      "used_count": 75,
      "unique_scan_count": 20,
      "revalidated_count": 15
    },
    "upsells": {
      "used_count": 65,
      "unique_scan_count": 10,
      "revalidated_count": 15
    },
    "total": {
      "data": {
        "tickets": {
          "used_count": 541,
          "unique_scan_count": 594,
          "revalidated_count": 443,
          "sold_count": 845
        },
        "vouchers": {
          "used_count": 124,
          "unique_scan_count": 235,
          "revalidated_count": 13,
          "sold_count": 658
        },
        "season-tickets": {
           "used_count": 75,
           "unique_scan_count": 20,
           "revalidated_count": 15,
           "sold_count": 848
        },
        "upsells": {
           "used_count": 65,
           "unique_scan_count": 10,
           "revalidated_count": 5,
           "sold_count": 48
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int|string (required) Example: me

collection agent id or reserved word me

idEventShow
int (required) 

id of event show

Basket ¶

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event

  • basket_items

Basket ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/id?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "amount": 1000,
    "flat_price": 1000,
    "fee": [
      {
        "name": "Service fee",
        "fee": 10
      }
    ],
    "currency": "AED",
    "promo_code": "promo",
    "expires": 1445507578,
    "references": {
      "event": 1
    },
    "event": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Swanlake",
        "start": 1445507578,
        "end": 1445518419,
        "image_big": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "image_medium": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "image_small": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "image_full": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "is_extra_security_mode_on": false,
        "has_tickets": true,
        "has_sales_started": true,
        "description": "Lorem ipsum sit dolores...",
        "url": "https://dubai.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/event_id/event_name",
        "white_label_url": "https://swanlake.platinumlist.net/event-tickets/11634/swanlake-test-event/ticket-office",
        "scanning_mode": true,
        "vat": 0,
        "is_attraction": true,
        "status": "approved",
        "rating": 12,
        "is_online": false
      }
    },
    "basket_items": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "price": 100
        }
      ]
    },
    "basket_upsells": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "price": 1000
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "amount": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float amount of basket"
        },
        "flat_price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float sum price from tickets, vouchers and its fees"
        },
        "fee": {
          "type": "array"
        },
        "currency": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "promo_code": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "expires": {
          "type": [
            "number",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "timestamp when basket expired"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event"
          ]
        },
        "event": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "image_big": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_medium": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_small": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_full": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "is_extra_security_mode_on": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where extra security mode is enabled"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "description": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "up to 64KiB bytes lenth"
                },
                "url": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Event link"
                },
                "white_label_url": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "Event white label link"
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if true - strict mode, if false - soft mode"
                },
                "vat": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float value added tax"
                },
                "is_attraction": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is attraction or not"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "approved",
                    "on sale",
                    "pre-register",
                    "pre-sale",
                    "sold out"
                  ],
                  "description": "shows the status of the event"
                },
                "rating": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "event rating"
                },
                "is_online": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is online or not"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "start",
                "end",
                "image_big",
                "image_medium",
                "image_small",
                "image_full",
                "is_extra_security_mode_on",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "description",
                "url",
                "scanning_mode",
                "vat",
                "is_attraction",
                "status",
                "rating",
                "is_online"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "basket_items": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "basket_upsells": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "amount",
        "flat_price",
        "fee",
        "currency"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Basket
GET/baskets/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/12622?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=basket_items.event_offer"

Empty basket response

{
  "data": {
    "amount": 0,
    "flat_price": 0,
    "fee": [],
    "currency": "AED",
    "promo_code": null,
    "expires": null,
    "basket_items": {
      "data": []
    }
  }
}

Not empty basket response

{
  "data": {
    "amount": 100,
    "flat_price": 100,
    "fee": [],
    "currency": "AED",
    "promo_code": null,
    "expires": 1490784234,
    "basket_items": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 6805809,
          "price": 100,
          "event_offer": {
            "data": {
              "id": 29886,
              "name": "GA",
              "price": 100,
              "currency": "AED",
              "description": null,
              "admit_count": 1,
              "ticket_count": 1,
              "voucher_count": 0,
              "type": "ticket",
              "is_season": false,
              "is_available": true,
              "is_package": false
            }
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Empty basket ¶

DELETE https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/id?scope
Responses204
Headers
Content-Type: application/json

Empty basket
DELETE/baskets/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Example ¶

Request

curl -X DELETE \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/12622?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets"
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Modify basket ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/id
RequestsPurchase
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "partner-sale.event-tickets",
  "operation": "purchase",
  "amount": 100,
  "event_service.id": [
    1
  ],
  "event_delivery_option": {
    "id": 1,
    "phone": "+971501234567",
    "address": "\"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae\""
  },
  "user": {
    "name": "John Smith",
    "email": "foo@example.com",
    "phone": "+971501234567",
    "birthday": "1988-02-15",
    "gender": "m",
    "nationality.id": 254,
    "city.id": 1
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "operation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid operation"
    },
    "amount": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "amount of basket to check"
    },
    "event_service.id": {
      "type": "array",
      "description": "id of services to include in basket on purchase"
    },
    "event_delivery_option": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "phone": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "address": {
          "type": "string"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "phone",
        "address"
      ],
      "description": "event delivery option data"
    },
    "user": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "email": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "email"
        },
        "phone": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "phone"
        },
        "birthday": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "birthday"
        },
        "gender": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "m",
            "f"
          ],
          "description": "gender"
        },
        "nationality.id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "nationality country id"
        },
        "city.id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "city id"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "name",
        "email",
        "phone",
        "birthday",
        "gender",
        "nationality.id",
        "city.id"
      ],
      "description": "basket owner data"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "operation",
    "amount",
    "user"
  ]
}
Responses200
Body
{
  "data": null,
  "meta": {
    "order.id": 1,
    "status": "success"
  }
}

Modify basket
PATCH/baskets/{id}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Purchase ¶

Purchase basket

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required)

  • operation string (required) - purchase

  • amount float (required) - the amount that the customer pays (basket amount + services)

  • event_service.id array (optional) - id services to be added

  • event_delivery_option object (optional) - event delivery option data

    • id number (required)
    • phone string (required)
    • address string (required,optional)

  • user object (required) - customer data

    • name string (required)
    • email string (required)
    • phone string (required)
    • birthday string (required)
    • gender enum["m", "f"] (required)
    • nationality.id number (required)
    • city.id number (required)

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "partner-sale.event-tickets",
  "operation": "purchase",
  "amount": 100,
  "event_delivery_option": {
    "id": 1,
    "phone": "+971501234567",
    "address": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae"
  },
  "user": {
    "name": "John Smith",
    "email": "foo@example.com",
    "phone": "+971501234567",
    "birthday": "1988-02-15",
    "gender": "m",
    "nationality.id": 254,
    "city.id": 1
  }
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/12622"

Response

{
  "data": null,
  "meta": {
    "order.id": 2967391,
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

Basket's item list
GET/baskets/{id}/items?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/12622/items?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references%2Cevent_offer"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 6806136,
      "price": 100,
      "references": {
        "event_offer": 29886
      },
      "event_offer": {
        "data": {
          "id": 29886,
          "name": "GA",
          "price": 100,
          "currency": "AED",
          "description": null,
          "admit_count": 1,
          "ticket_count": 1,
          "voucher_count": 0,
          "type": "ticket",
          "is_season": false,
          "is_available": true,
          "is_package": false
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}

Basket's item
GET/baskets/{id}/items/{idBasketItem}?{scope}

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_offer

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/12622/items/6806136?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=references%2Cevent_offer"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 6806136,
    "price": 100,
    "references": {
      "event_offer": 29886
    },
    "event_offer": {
      "data": {
        "id": 29886,
        "name": "GA",
        "price": 100,
        "currency": "AED",
        "description": null,
        "admit_count": 1,
        "ticket_count": 1,
        "voucher_count": 0,
        "type": "ticket",
        "is_season": false,
        "is_available": true,
        "is_package": false
      }
    }
  }

Add offer to basket ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/id/items
RequestsRegular
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "partner-sale.event-tickets",
  "promo_code": "abc",
  "data": {
    "event_offer.id": 1
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "promo_code": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ],
      "description": "promo code for specified event offer"
    },
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "event_offer.id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "event offer id"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "event_offer.id"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope"
  ]
}
Responses201400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "price": 100,
    "references": {
      "event_offer": 1
    },
    "event_offer": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Adult silver",
        "price": 100,
        "currency": "AED",
        "description": "Info",
        "admit_count": 1,
        "ticket_count": 1,
        "voucher_count": 1,
        "season_ticket_count": 1,
        "type": "ticket",
        "is_season": false,
        "is_available": false,
        "is_package": false
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of basket item"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_offer": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event offer"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_offer"
          ]
        },
        "event_offer": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event offer"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float price"
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "admit_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "admits count per offer"
                },
                "ticket_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "count tickets per offer"
                },
                "voucher_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "count vouchers per offer"
                },
                "season_ticket_count": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "count season tickets per offer"
                },
                "type": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "ticket",
                    "season ticket",
                    "table",
                    "voucher",
                    "package"
                  ]
                },
                "is_season": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when offer contain tickets for several shows"
                },
                "is_available": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when offer can be sold"
                },
                "is_package": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when offer has various tickets or vouchers"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "price",
                "currency",
                "description",
                "admit_count",
                "ticket_count",
                "voucher_count",
                "season_ticket_count",
                "type",
                "is_season",
                "is_available",
                "is_package"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "price"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Resource data validation failed",
    "code": 300,
    "invalid_fields": {
      "event_offer.id": {
        "invalid": "Invalid event offer provided"
      }
    }
  }
}

Add offer to basket
POST/baskets/{id}/items

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required)

  • promo_code string (optional)

  • data object (required)

    • event_offer.id int (required)

Example ¶

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "partner-sale.event-tickets",
  "data":{
    "event_offer.id": 29886
  },
  "include": "event_offer"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/12622/items"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 6775048,
    "price": 100,
    "event_offer": {
      "data": {
        "id": 29886,
        "name": "GA",
        "price": 100,
        "currency": "AED",
        "description": null,
        "admit_count": 1,
        "ticket_count": 1,
        "voucher_count": 0,
        "type": "ticket",
        "is_season": false,
        "is_available": true,
        "is_package": false
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event show id

            "price": 10,
            "references": {
                "basket": 56,
                "upsell_item": 8

Add upsell item to basket ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/id/upsells
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope `partner-sale.order-upsell`": "",
  "data": {
    "upsell_item.id": 1,
    "upsell_questions": [
      0,
      {
        "": "value: `Yes`"
      }
    ]
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope `partner-sale.order-upsell`": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "upsell_item.id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "upsell item id"
        },
        "upsell_questions": {
          "type": "array"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "upsell_item.id"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope `partner-sale.order-upsell`"
  ]
}

Add upsell item to basket
POST/baskets/{id}/upsells

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.order-upsell

Example ¶

Add upsell item to basket

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - partner-sale.order-upsell

  • data object (required)

    • upsell_item.id int (required) - upsell item id
    • upsell_questions array (required) - if upsell has no questions, pass as an empty array []
      • id int (required)
      • value string or object

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "partner-sale.order-upsell",
  "data": {
      "upsell_item.id": 1,
      "upsell_questions": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "value": "r1"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "value": { "0": "d2"}
        }
      ]
    },
    "include": "references"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/baskets/715/upsells"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 20,
        "price": 10,
        "references": {
            "basket": 56,
            "upsell_item": 8
        }
    }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

Event Show id

Responses204
Headers
Content-Type: application/json

Order ¶

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event

  • user

  • event_tickets

  • event_vouchers

  • event_season_tickets

  • customer_fields

  • order_services

  • order_delivery

  • fee

Valid order statuses:

  • “completed”

  • “pending payment”

  • “expired”

Order List ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "completed": 1445507578,
      "comment": "Some text",
      "is_preprinted": true,
      "extended_verification_code": "Some text",
      "is_delayed_delivery": true,
      "ticket_waiting_text": "Your tickets will be sent in a few minutes",
      "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
      "amount": 544.38,
      "currency": "'AED'",
      "status": "completed",
      "is_white_label": false,
      "sale_integration": "'DTCM'",
      "timezone": "'Asia/Dubai'",
      "payment_type": "'PG name'"
    }
  ]
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Order List
GET/orders?{scope}

Valid scopes for orders:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-H "Cache-Control: no-cache" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event_tickets"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 2967391,
      "completed": 1490709625,
      "comment": "",
      "is_preprinted": false,
      "extended_verification_code": "",
      "is_delayed_delivery": false,
      "ticket_waiting_text" : "",
      "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
      "amount": 544.38,
      "currency": "AED",
      "status": "completed",
      "event_tickets": {
        "data": [
          {
            "id": 7474596,
            "price": 100,
            "ident": "2967391-96901074520190065",
            "alternate_ident": "",
            "is_used": false,
            "usage_updated": 1490709199
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

user.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter by user id

event.id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter by event id

Order ¶

Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "completed": 1445507578,
    "comment": "Some text",
    "is_preprinted": true,
    "extended_verification_code": "Some text",
    "is_delayed_delivery": true,
    "ticket_waiting_text": "Your tickets will be sent in a few minutes",
    "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
    "amount": 544.38,
    "currency": "'AED'",
    "status": "completed",

      "event": 1,

    },

      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Swanlake",

          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },

          "width": 1,

        },

        "has_sales_started": true,

        "vat": 0,

      }

      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Smith",
        "email": "foo@example.com",
        "phone": "+971501234567",
        "gender": "m",
        "birthday": "1988-02-15",
        "is_closed": false,
        "is_blocked": false
      }
    },
    "partner_company": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Platinumlist",
        "avatar": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
          "width": 1,
          "height": 1
        },
        "is_blocked": false
      }
    },
    "fee": {
      "data": [
        {
          "name": "Fee",
          "fee": 5
        }
      ]
    },
    "order_delivery": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "price": 50,
          "phone": "+971501234567",
          "address": "Som address",
          "is_delivered": true,
          "timestamp": 1445507578
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_tickets": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "ident": "12345-67890123456",
          "price": 1000,
          "alternate_ident": "1234567889",
          "used_count": 3,
          "valid_until": 1445507578,
          "online_url": "null",
          "online_instructions": "null"
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_vouchers": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "ident": "1234-567890123",
          "price": 1000,
          "is_used": true,
          "collector_alias": "Bob",
          "usage_updated": 1445507578,
          "valid_until": 1558515840,
          "usage_summary": 1
        }
      ]
    },
    "event_season_tickets": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "ident": "12345-67890123456",
          "price": 1000,
          "used_count": 3
        }
      ]
    },
    "order_services": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "price": 100
        }
      ]
    },
    "customer_fields": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id_event_ticket": 1869,
          "id_event_voucher": 236,
          "id_event_season_ticket": 1834,
          "id_order": 53689,
          "id_event_customer_field": 2,
          "value": "Company",
          "update_datetime": "2018"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of order"
        },
        "completed": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp when order was completed"
        },
        "comment": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "is_preprinted": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "extended_verification_code": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "is_delayed_delivery": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "purchased tickets will be sent to the user with some delay"
        },
        "ticket_waiting_text": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "expiration_datetime": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp when order expires"
        },
        "amount": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "order amount"
        },
        "currency": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "order currency"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "completed",
            "expired",
            "pending payment"
          ],
          "description": "order status"
        },
        "is_white_label": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "sale_integration": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "timezone": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "payment_type": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event"
            },
            "user": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of user"
            },
            "partner_company": {
              "type": [
                "number",
                "null"
              ],
              "description": "id of partner company"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event",
            "user",
            "partner_company"
          ]
        },
        "event": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "start": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of start date time"
                },
                "end": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "image_big": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_medium": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",

                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",

                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },

                  "type": [

                      "type": "string",

                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"

                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_full": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",

                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "is_extra_security_mode_on": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where extra security mode is enabled"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "description": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "up to 64KiB bytes lenth"
                },
                "url": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Event link"
                },
                "white_label_url": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "Event white label link"
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if true - strict mode, if false - soft mode"
                },
                "vat": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float value added tax"
                },
                "is_attraction": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is attraction or not"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "approved",
                    "on sale",
                    "pre-register",
                    "pre-sale",
                    "sold out"
                  ],
                  "description": "shows the status of the event"
                },
                "rating": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "event rating"
                },
                "is_online": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is online or not"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "start",
                "end",
                "image_big",
                "image_medium",
                "image_small",
                "image_full",
                "is_extra_security_mode_on",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "description",
                "url",
                "scanning_mode",
                "vat",
                "is_attraction",
                "status",
                "rating",
                "is_online"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "user": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of user"

                "name": {

                  ],

                "birthday": {

                  "description": "birth date"

                "is_closed": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account closed"
                },
                "is_blocked": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account blocked"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "email",
                "phone",
                "gender",
                "birthday",
                "is_closed",
                "is_blocked"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "partner_company": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of partner company"

                "name": {

                },
                "avatar": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",

                  ],
                  "description": "link to partner company image"
                },

                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "blocked or not blocked partner company"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "avatar",
                "is_blocked"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "fee": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "order_delivery": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_tickets": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_vouchers": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_season_tickets": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {

              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "order_services": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "customer_fields": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "completed",
        "comment",
        "is_preprinted",
        "expiration_datetime",
        "amount",
        "currency",
        "status",
        "is_white_label",
        "timezone"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Order
GET/orders/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes for “completed” orders:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • use.event-season-tickets

  • print.badges

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

Valid scopes for “pending payment” orders:

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-H "Cache-Control: no-cache" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/2967391?scope=partner-sale.event-tickets&include=event_tickets,fee"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 2967391,
    "completed": 1490709625,
    "comment": "",
    "is_preprinted": false,
    "extended_verification_code": "",
    "is_delayed_delivery": false,
    "ticket_waiting_text" : "",
    "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
    "amount": 544.38,
    "currency": "AED",
    "status": "completed",
    "is_white_label": false,
    "sale_integration": "dtcm",
    "event_tickets": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 7474596,
          "price": 100,
          "ident": "2967391-96901074520190065",
          "alternate_ident": "",
          "is_used": false,
          "usage_updated": 1490709199
        }
      ]
    },
    "fee": [
        {
            "name": "Partner company fee",
            "fee": 5
        }
    ]
  }
}

or

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-H "Cache-Control: no-cache" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/2967391?scope=partner-sale.receive-payments&include=event_tickets,fee"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 2967391,
    "completed": null,
    "comment": "",
    "is_preprinted": false,
    "extended_verification_code": "",
    "is_delayed_delivery": false,
    "ticket_waiting_text": "",
    "expiration_datetime": 1510671937,
    "amount": 304.69,
    "currency": "AED",
    "status": "pending payment",
    "is_white_label": false,
    "sale_integration": "dtcm",
    "event_tickets": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 7474596,
          "price": 99.95,
          "ident": "",
          "alternate_ident": "",
          "used_count": 0,
          "valid_until": null
        },
        {
          "id": 7474597,
          "price": 95.8,
          "ident": "",
          "alternate_ident": "",
          "used_count": 0,
          "valid_until": null
        }
      ]
    },
    "fee": {
      "data": [
        {
          "name": "Partner company fee 2",
          "fee": 10
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

note empty ticket’s ident and alternate_ident if “is_delayed_delivery” is true, or if tickets was uploaded by organiser

URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

order id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Modify order ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/id
RequestsPurchase
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "partner-sale.receive-payments",
  "operation": "purchase",
  "amount": 544.38
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "operation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid operation"
    },
    "amount": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "valid order amount"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "operation",
    "amount"
  ]
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",

                  "description": "timestamp of end date time"
                },
                "image_big": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_medium": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_small": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "image_full": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to event image"
                },
                "is_extra_security_mode_on": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where extra security mode is enabled"
                },
                "has_tickets": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has tickets for sale"
                },
                "has_sales_started": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows where event has started sales"
                },
                "description": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "up to 64KiB bytes lenth"
                },
                "url": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Event link"
                },
                "white_label_url": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "Event white label link"
                },
                "scanning_mode": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "if true - strict mode, if false - soft mode"
                },
                "vat": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "float value added tax"
                },
                "is_attraction": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is attraction or not"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "approved",
                    "on sale",
                    "pre-register",
                    "pre-sale",
                    "sold out"
                  ],
                  "description": "shows the status of the event"
                },
                "rating": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "event rating"
                },
                "is_online": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows event is online or not"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "start",
                "end",
                "image_big",
                "image_medium",
                "image_small",
                "image_full",
                "is_extra_security_mode_on",
                "has_tickets",
                "has_sales_started",
                "description",
                "url",
                "scanning_mode",
                "vat",
                "is_attraction",
                "status",
                "rating",
                "is_online"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "user": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of user"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "user full name"
                },
                "email": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "email"
                },
                "phone": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "phone"
                },
                "gender": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "enum": [
                    "m",
                    "f",
                    null
                  ],
                  "description": "gender"
                },
                "birthday": {
                  "type": [
                    "string",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "description": "birth date"
                },
                "is_closed": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account closed"
                },
                "is_blocked": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "shows when user account blocked"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "email",
                "phone",
                "gender",
                "birthday",
                "is_closed",
                "is_blocked"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "partner_company": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of partner company"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "avatar": {
                  "type": [
                    "object",
                    "null"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "src": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "link to image"
                    },
                    "width": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image width"
                    },
                    "height": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "image height"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "src",
                    "width",
                    "height"
                  ],
                  "description": "link to partner company image"
                },
                "is_blocked": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "blocked or not blocked partner company"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "avatar",
                "is_blocked"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "fee": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "order_delivery": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_tickets": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_vouchers": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "event_season_tickets": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "order_services": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        },
        "customer_fields": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "array"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "completed",
        "comment",
        "is_preprinted",
        "expiration_datetime",
        "amount",
        "currency",
        "status",
        "is_white_label",
        "timezone"
      ]
    },
    "meta": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "status": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "success",
            "failed"
          ]
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "status"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Modify order
PATCH/orders/{id}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.receive-payments

Pay ¶

Payment of an order

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required)

  • operation string (required) - pay

  • amount float (required) - 544.38

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "partner-sale.event-tickets",
  "operation": "pay",
  "amount": 544.38,
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/2967391"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 2967391,
    "completed": 1490709625,
    "comment": "",
    "is_preprinted": false,
    "extended_verification_code": "",
    "is_delayed_delivery": true,
    "ticket_waiting_text" : "Your tickets will be sent in a few minutes",
    "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
    "amount": 544.38,
    "currency": "AED"
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

order id

Order's customer field list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/id/customer-fields?scope
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Company",
      "type": "text",
      "description": "null",
      "target": "offer",
      "is_required": false,
      "is_enabled": true,
      "filling_time": "scanning",
      "type_options": {
        "text_is_multi_line": 0,
        "text_max_fields_count": 1,
        "text_max_length": 100,
        "text_validator": "email",
        "upload_max_file_size": 2048,
        "upload_image_min_width": 0,
        "upload_image_min_height": 0,
        "upload_image_max_width": 0,
        "upload_image_max_height": 0,
        "disclaimer_label": "a little bit text",
        "disclaimer_url": "terms url",
        "date_min": "2017",
        "date_max": "2017",
        "choice_style": "checkbox/dropdown",
        "choice_max_selected_options_count": 2,
        "choice_options": [],
        "choice_is_custom_value_allowed": 1,
        "choice_is_custom_value_shared": 1
      }
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Order does not have customer fields",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Order's customer field list
GET/orders/{id}/customer-fields?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Available resource includes:

  • event_customer_field

Example ¶

Returns customer fields with target type offer only

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/53689/customer-fields?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id_order": 53689,
      "id_event_customer_field": 1,
      "value": "General",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    },
    {
      "id_order": 53689,
      "id_event_customer_field": 2,
      "value": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/order-customer-files/69_1b464cad9ad251d89a4747112f047392-0.png",
          "width": 1024,
          "height": 1024
      },
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow

int (required)

string (required) 

valid scope

      "value": "Company",
      "update_datetime": "2018"
    }

      "type": "array"
    }

    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": "104"
