Order customer field
GET/orders/{id}/customer-fields/{idEventCustomerField}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/2967391/customer-fields/2?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id_order": 53689,
        "id_event_customer_field": 2,
        "value": "Custom text",
        "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

order id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

idEventCustomerField
int (required) 

event customer field id

Add or replace customer field ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/id/customer-fields
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": "example string"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "`print.badges`"
    },
    "id_event_customer_field": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "event customer field id"
    },
    "value": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "customer field value"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "id_event_customer_field"
  ]
}
Responses200400400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id_order": 53689,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": "example string"
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": "104"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid value for customer field",
    "code": 300,
    "invalid_fields": {
      "value": {
        "errorCode": "errorMessage"
      }
    }
  }
}

Add or replace customer field
POST/orders/{id}/customer-fields

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Add or replace value in order customer field by event customer field id

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - print.badges

  • id_event_customer_field number (required) - event customer field id

  • value string or array (optional, nullable) - customer field value

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 1,
  "value": "example string"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/53689/customer-fields"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id_order": 53689,
    "id_event_customer_field": 1,
    "value": "example string",
    "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

order id

Upload image ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/id/customer-fields
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "2967391": "{LOCAL FILE NAME}",
  "scope": "print.badges",
  "id_event_customer_field": 2,
  "value": "2967391"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "2967391": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "`print.badges`"
    },
    "id_event_customer_field": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "event customer field id"
    },
    "value": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "customer field value"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "id_event_customer_field",
    "value"
  ]
}
Responses200400400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id_order": 53689,
    "id_event_customer_field": 2,
    "value": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/order-customer-files/87_04403deac48c1c1e99096822cada1d0b-0.jpg",
      "width": 373,
      "height": 76
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Event customer field no found",
    "code": 104
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid value for customer field",
    "code": 300,
    "invalid_fields": {
      "value": {
        "errorCode": "errorMessage"
      }
    }
  }
}

Upload image
POST/orders/{id}/customer-fields

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

EXAMPLE ¶

Upload image

Headers parameters:

  • Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Body parameters:

  • {CUSTOM_KEY} string (required) - local file name

  • scope string (required) - print.badges

  • value string or array (optional, nullable) - if upload image set CUSTOM_KEY

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-F "2967391=@{LOCAL FILE NAME}" \
-F "scope=partner-sale.event-tickets" -F "id_event_customer_field=2" -F "value=2967391" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/53689/customer-fields"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id_order": 53689,
    "id_event_customer_field": 2,
    "value": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/order-customer-files/69_1b464cad9ad251d89a4747112f047392-0.png",
      "width": 1024,
      "height": 1024
    },
    "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

order id

Batch order customer fields ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/id/customer-fields/batch
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Responses200400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  }
]
Headers
Content-Type: application/json

Batch order customer fields
POST/orders/{id}/customer-fields/batch

Caution ¶

For upload image use header Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Body parameters:

  • data array (required) - array of add operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the adding of a single customer field plus you must pass id_event_customer_filed of event customer field

Example ¶

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 20,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 25,
      "value": "Willy"
    },
    {
      "scope": "print.badges",
      "id_event_customer_field": 32,
      "value": "1970-01-01"
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/1868/customer-fields/batch"

or

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-F "data[0][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[0][id_event_customer_field]=3" -F "data[0][value]=2001-12-29" \
-F "data[1][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[1][id_event_customer_field]=20" -F "data[1][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[2][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[2][id_event_customer_field]=25" -F "data[2][value]=Willy" \
-F "data[3][scope]=print.badges" -F "data[3][id_event_customer_field]=32" -F "data[3][value]=1970-01-01" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/1868/customer-fields/batch"

Response

[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 3,
      "value": "2001-12-29",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 20, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 25, 
      "value": "Willy",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id_order": 1868,
      "id_event_customer_field": 32, 
      "value": "1970-01-01",
      "update_datetime": "2018-03-26 09:42:09"
    }
  }
]
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

order id

Order's delivery ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/id/deliveries?scope
Responses200404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "price": 50,
      "phone": "+971501234567",
      "address": "Som address",
      "is_delivered": true,
      "timestamp": 1445507578
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Order does not have delivery",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Order's delivery
GET/orders/{id}/deliveries?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.event-tickets

  • use.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • order

  • event_delivery_option

  • user

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/645/deliveries?scope=use.event-tickets&include=references,event_delivery_option,order"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "price": 160,
    "phone": "+971501234567",
    "address": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ornare metus tincidunt, mattis felis ut, eleifend nulla. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae",
    "is_delivered": false,
    "timestamp": null,
    "references": {
      "order": 645,
      "event_delivery_option": 4,
      "user": null
    },
    "order": {
      "data": {
        "id": 645,
        "completed": 1532354830,
        "comment": "",
        "is_preprinted": false,
        "extended_verification_code": "",
        "is_delayed_delivery": false,
        "ticket_waiting_text": "",
        "expiration_datetime": null,
        "amount": 1070.07,
        "currency": "AED",
        "status": "completed"
      }
    },
    "event_delivery_option": {
      "data": {
        "id": 4,
        "name": "option 4",
        "package_price": 40,
        "is_enabled": true
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event delivery id

scope
string (required) 

valid scope

Order upsells ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/orders/upsell?

Order upsells
GET/orders/upsell?

Valid scopes:

  • use.order-upsells

  • print.order-upsells

Available resource includes:

  • upsell_item

  • order

  • order_upsell_question_answer

  • references

Example ¶

Order service ¶

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.event-tickets

  • partner-sale.event-vouchers

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event_service

  • order

Order service ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/order-services/id?scope
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "price": 100,
    "references": {
      "event_service": 1,
      "order": 1
    },
    "event_service": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "REFUND GUARANTEE SERVICE",
        "price": {
          "fixed": 10,
          "percent": 10,
          "basket": 10
        },
        "currency": "AED",
        "description": "Info"
      }
    },
    "order": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "completed": 1445507578,
        "comment": "Some text",
        "is_preprinted": true,
        "extended_verification_code": "Some text",
        "is_delayed_delivery": true,
        "ticket_waiting_text": "Your tickets will be sent in a few minutes",
        "expiration_datetime": 1507921039,
        "amount": 544.38,
        "currency": "'AED'",
        "status": "completed",
        "is_white_label": false,
        "sale_integration": "'DTCM'",
        "timezone": "'Asia/Dubai'",
        "payment_type": "'PG name'"
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of order service"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "event_service": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of event service"
            },
            "order": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "id of order"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "event_service",
            "order"
          ]
        },
        "event_service": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of event service"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "price": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "fixed": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "fixed price"
                    },
                    "percent": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "percent price"
                    },
                    "basket": {
                      "type": "number",
                      "description": "basket price"
                    }
                  },
                  "required": [
                    "fixed",
                    "percent"
                  ]
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": {
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "currency",
                "description"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
        "order": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of order"
                },
                "completed": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp when order was completed"
                },
                "comment": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "is_preprinted": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "extended_verification_code": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "is_delayed_delivery": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "purchased tickets will be sent to the user with some delay"
                },
                "ticket_waiting_text": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "expiration_datetime": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "timestamp when order expires"
                },
                "amount": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "order amount"
                },
                "currency": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "order currency"
                },
                "status": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "enum": [
                    "completed",
                    "expired",
                    "pending payment"
                  ],
                  "description": "order status"
                },
                "is_white_label": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "sale_integration": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "timezone": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "payment_type": {
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "completed",
                "comment",
                "is_preprinted",
                "expiration_datetime",
                "amount",
                "currency",
                "status",
                "is_white_label",
                "timezone"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "price"
      ]
    }
  }
}

  • partner-sale.event-season-tickets

    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "concert",
      "is_attraction": true,
      "is_online": false
    }
  ]

  "type": "object",

    "data": {
      "type": "array"

  }

GET/event-types?{search,is_attraction}

-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \ 
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-types"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 14,

      "is_online": false

      "is_attraction": true,
      "is_online": false

      "id": 38,
      "name": "Ballet",
      "is_attraction": false,
      "is_online": false

    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Bar",
      "is_attraction": true,
      "is_online": false

    {
      "id": 32,
      "name": "Beach Club",
      "is_attraction": true,
      "is_online": false
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Boat party",
      "is_attraction": false,
      "is_online": false
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "name": "Brunches",
      "is_attraction": false,
      "is_online": false
    },
    {
      "id": 44,
      "name": "Christmas",
      "is_attraction": true,
      "is_online": false
    },
    {
      "id": 18,
      "name": "Classical",
      "is_attraction": false,
      "is_online": false

    {
      "id": 9,
      "name": "Comedy",
      "is_attraction": true,
      "is_online": false
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 44,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 5,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-types?page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
search
string (optional) 

query string to search by even type name

is_attraction
number (optional) 

filter event type by attraction

is_online
number (optional) 

filter event type by online

Event type ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-types/id
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "concert",
    "is_attraction": true,
    "is_online": false
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of event type"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "is_attraction": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "shows event type is attraction or not"
        },
        "is_online": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "marks online event type"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "is_attraction",
        "is_online"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Event type
GET/event-types/{id}

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \ 
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/event-types/38?include=references,parent,children"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 38,
    "name": "Ballet",
    "is_attraction": true,
    "references": {
      "parent_id": 2,
      "child_ids": [
        76
      ]
    },
    "parent": {
      "data": {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "Show"
      }
    },
    "children": {
      "data": [
        {
          "id": 76,
          "name": "Classic"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

event type id

Venue ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/venues/id
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Club",
    "info": "Some text",
    "location": "Som address",
    "phone": "+97501234567",
    "website": "https://example.com",
    "latitude": "25.068212",
    "longitude": "55.192797",
    "image_big": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
      "width": 1,
      "height": 1
    },
    "image_small": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
      "width": 1,
      "height": 1
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of venue"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "info": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "location": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "phone": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "website": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "latitude": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "longitude": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ]
        },
        "image_big": {
          "type": [
            "object",
            "null"
          ],
          "properties": {
            "src": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "link to image"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image width"
            },
            "height": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image height"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "src",
            "width",
            "height"
          ],
          "description": "link to venue image"
        },
        "image_small": {
          "type": [
            "object",
            "null"
          ],
          "properties": {
            "src": {
              "type": "string",
              "description": "link to image"
            },
            "width": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "image width"
            },
            "height": {
              "type": "number",

            }

            "src",
            "width",
            "height"

        "id",

        "image_big",
        "image_small"

City list
GET/cities?{search,country.search,country.id}

Available sorts:

  • name - default

  • country.name

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/cities?include=references"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Abu Dhabi",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "name": "Ajman",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 5,
      "name": "Al Ain",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",

        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Dubai",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 279,
      "name": "Fujairah",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 264,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 27,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/cities?include=references&page=2"
      }
    }
  }

City active list ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/cities/active
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Dubai",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai"
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

City active list
GET/cities/active

Available sorts:

  • name - default

  • country.name

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • country

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/cities/active?include=references"

Response

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Abu Dhabi",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "name": "Ajman",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 5,
      "name": "Al Ain",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Dubai",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 279,
      "name": "Fujairah",
      "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
      "references": {
        "country": 254
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 264,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 27,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/cities/active?include=references&page=2"
      }
    }
  }
}

City ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/cities/id
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Dubai",
    "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
    "references": {
      "country": 1
    },
    "country": {
      "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "USA",
        "country_code": "US"
      }
    }
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of city"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "name"
        },
        "timezone": {
          "type": [
            "string",
            "null"
          ],
          "description": "timezone"
        },
        "references": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "country": {
              "type": "number",
              "description": "country id"
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "country"
          ]
        },
        "country": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "data": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "id": {
                  "type": "number",
                  "description": "unique identifier of country"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "name"
                },
                "country_code": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "ISO country code"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "country_code"
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "timezone"
      ]
    }
  }
}

City
GET/cities/{id}

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \ 
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/cities/1?include=references%2Ccountry"

Response

{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Dubai",
    "timezone": "Asia/Dubai",
    "references": {
      "country": 254
    },
    "country": {
      "data": {
        "id": 254,
        "name": "United Arab Emirates",
        "code": "AE"
      }
    }
  }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

city id

-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \ 
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/countries"

  "data": [
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Afghanistan",
      "code": "AF"
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "name": "Albania",
      "code": "AL"
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "name": "Algeria",
      "code": "DZ"
    },
    {
      "id": 5,
      "name": "American Samoa",
      "code": "AS"
    },
    {
      "id": 6,
      "name": "Andorra",
      "code": "AD"
    },
    {
      "id": 7,
      "name": "Angola",
      "code": "AO"
    },
    {
      "id": 8,
      "name": "Anguilla",
      "code": "AI"
    },
    {
      "id": 10,
      "name": "Antigua and Barbuda",
      "code": "AG"
    },
    {
      "id": 11,
      "name": "Argentina",
      "code": "AR"
    },
    {
      "id": 12,
      "name": "Armenia",
      "code": "AM"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "total": 235,
      "count": 10,
      "per_page": 10,
      "current_page": 1,
      "total_pages": 24,
      "links": {
        "next": "https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/countries?include=references&page=2"
      }
    }
  }

Country ¶

Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "USA",
    "country_code": "US"
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of country"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name"
        },
        "country_code": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "ISO country code"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "name",
        "country_code"
      ]
    }
  }
}

        "print ticket",

Self Serve Profile
GET/self-serve-profile?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.self-serve

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/self-serve-profile?scope=use.self-serve"

Self Serve Profile
GET/self-serve-profile/{id}?{scope}

Valid scopes:

  • use.self-serve

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/self-serve/1?scope=use.self-serve"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "profile_name": "test-1",
        "is_allow_screen_to_sleep": false,
        "id_promo_group": 1,
        "password": "",
        "mode": [
            "buy tickets"
        ],
        "layout": "regular",
        "intro_image": {
           "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/self-serve/8_3c68b24984b88a20871c78946583588f-01548773346.jpg",

           "height": 76
        },
        "intro_custom_text": [
            {
             "lang": "ar",

Add Self Serve Profile ¶

POST https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/self-serve-profile
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: multipart/form-data
Body
{
  "2967391": "{LOCAL FILE NAME}",
  "scope": "use.self",
  "id_promo_group": 1,
  "profile_name": "test-1",
  "intro_image": "2967391"
}
Schema
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "2967391": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "serve (string, required) - `use.self-serve`"
    },
    "id_promo_group": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "promo group id"
    },
    "profile_name": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "self serve profile name"
    },
    "intro_image": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "customer field value"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "id_promo_group",
    "profile_name",
    "intro_image"
  ],
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
}
Responses201400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "profile_name": "test-1",
    "is_allow_screen_to_sleep": false,
    "id_promo_group": 1,
    "password": "",
    "mode": [
      "buy tickets"
    ],
    "layout": "regular",
    "intro_image": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/self-serve/87_04403deac48c1c1e99096822cada1d0b-0.jpg",
      "width": 400,
      "height": 300
    },
    "intro_custom_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "intro_buy_button_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": "test-ar"
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": "test-en"
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "final_step_on_success_do": [
      "send email",
      "print"
    ],
    "final_step_is_allow_repeat_print": false,
    "final_step_image": {},
    "final_step_custom_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "final_step_print_button_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "languages": [],
    "default_language": "en",
    "timestamp": 1548436760
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": true
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Promo group not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Add Self Serve Profile
POST/self-serve-profile

Valid scopes:

  • use.self-serve

EXAMPLE ¶

Add self serve profile

Headers parameters:

  • Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.self-serve

  • profile_name string (required) - test-1

  • id_promo_group number (required) - 1

  • intro_image string (optional, nullable) - if upload image set CUSTOM_KEY

  • {CUSTOM_KEY} string (required) - local file name

Request

curl -X POST \
-H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-F "2967391=@{LOCAL FILE NAME}" \
-F "scope=use.self-serve" \
-F "profile_name=test-1" \
-F "promo_group_id=1" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[0][lang]=ar" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[0][value]=test-ar" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[1][lang]=en" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[1][value]=test-en" \
-F "intro_image=2967391" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/self-serve-profile"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "profile_name": "test-1",
        "is_allow_screen_to_sleep": false,
        "id_promo_group": 1,
        "password": "",
        "mode": [
            "buy tickets"
        ],
        "layout": "regular",
        "intro_image": {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/self-serve/87_04403deac48c1c1e99096822cada1d0b-0.jpg",
          "width": 400,
          "height": 300
        },
        "intro_custom_text": [
            {
             "lang": "ar",
             "value": null
            },
            {
             "lang": "en",
             "value": null
            },
            {
             "lang": "vi",
             "value": null
            }
        ],
        "intro_buy_button_text": [
            {
              "lang": "ar",
              "value": "test-ar"
            },
            {
              "lang": "en",
              "value": "test-en"
            },
            {
              "lang": "vi",
              "value": null
            }
        ],
        "final_step_on_success_do": [
            "send email",
            "print"
        ],
        "final_step_is_allow_repeat_print": false,
        "final_step_image": {},
        "final_step_custom_text": [
            {
                "lang": "ar",
                "value": null
            },
            {
                "lang": "en",
                "value": null
            },
            {
                "lang": "vi",
                "value": null
            }
        ],
        "final_step_print_button_text": [
            {
              "lang": "ar",
              "value": null
            },
            {
              "lang": "en",
              "value": null
            },
            {
              "lang": "vi",
              "value": null
            }
        ],
        "languages": ["en", "ar", "vi"],
        "default_language": "en",
        "timestamp": 1548436760
    },
    "meta": {
        "status": true
    }
}

Edit Self Serve Profile ¶

PUT https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/self-serve-profile/1
RequestsExample
Headers
Content-Type: multipart/form-data
Body
{
  "2967391": "{LOCAL FILE NAME}",
  "scope": "use.self",
  "id_promo_group": 1,
  "profile_name": "test-2",
  "intro_image": "2967391"
}
Schema
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "2967391": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "serve (string, required) - `use.self-serve`"
    },
    "id_promo_group": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "promo group id"
    },
    "profile_name": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "self serve profile name"
    },
    "intro_image": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "customer field value"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "id_promo_group",
    "profile_name",
    "intro_image"
  ],
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
}
Responses201400
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "profile_name": "test-2",
    "is_allow_screen_to_sleep": false,
    "id_promo_group": 1,
    "password": "",
    "mode": [
      "buy tickets"
    ],
    "layout": "regular",
    "intro_image": {
      "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/self-serve/87_04403deac48c1c1e99096822cada1d0b-0.jpg",
      "width": 400,
      "height": 300
    },
    "intro_custom_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "intro_buy_button_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": "test-ar"
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": "test-en"
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "final_step_on_success_do": [
      "send email",
      "print"
    ],
    "final_step_is_allow_repeat_print": false,
    "final_step_image": {},
    "final_step_custom_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "final_step_print_button_text": [
      {
        "lang": "ar",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "en",
        "value": null
      },
      {
        "lang": "vi",
        "value": null
      }
    ],
    "languages": [],
    "default_language": "en",
    "timestamp": 1548436760
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": true
  }
}

Content-Type: application/json

  "error": {
    "message": "Promo group not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

Edit Self Serve Profile
PUT/self-serve-profile/1

Valid scopes:

  • use.self-serve

EXAMPLE ¶

Edit self serve profile

Headers parameters:

  • Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.self-serve

  • profile_name string (required) - test-2

  • id_promo_group number (required) - 1

  • intro_image string (optional, nullable) - if upload image set CUSTOM_KEY

  • {CUSTOM_KEY} string (required) - local file name

Request

curl -X PUT \
-H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-F "2967391=@{LOCAL FILE NAME}" \
-F "scope=use.self-serve" \
-F "profile_name=test-1" \
-F "promo_group_id=1" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[0][lang]=ar" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[0][value]=test-ar" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[1][lang]=en" \
-F "intro_buy_button_text[1][value]=test-en" \
-F "intro_image=2967391" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/self-serve-profile"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "profile_name": "test-2",
        "is_allow_screen_to_sleep": false,
        "id_promo_group": 1,
        "password": "",
        "mode": [
            "buy tickets"
        ],
        "layout": "regular",
        "intro_image": {
            "src": "https://platinumlist.net/upload/self-serve/87_04403deac48c1c1e99096822cada1d0b-0.jpg",
            "width": 400,
            "height": 300
        },
        "intro_custom_text": [
            {
             "lang": "ar",
             "value": null
            },
            {
             "lang": "en",
             "value": null
            },
            {
             "lang": "vi",
             "value": null
            }
        ],
        "intro_buy_button_text": [
            {
              "lang": "ar",
              "value": "test-ar"
            },
            {
              "lang": "en",
              "value": "test-en"
            },
            {
              "lang": "vi",
              "value": null
            }
        ],
        "final_step_on_success_do": [
            "send email",
            "print"
        ],
        "final_step_is_allow_repeat_print": false,
        "final_step_image": {},
        "final_step_custom_text": [
            {
                "lang": "ar",
                "value": null
            },
            {
                "lang": "en",
                "value": null
            },
            {
                "lang": "vi",
                "value": null
            }
        ],
        "final_step_print_button_text": [
            {
              "lang": "ar",
              "value": null
            },
            {
              "lang": "en",
              "value": null
            },
            {
              "lang": "vi",
              "value": null
            }
        ],
        "languages": [],
        "default_language": "en",
        "timestamp": 1548436760
    },
    "meta": {
        "status": true
    }
}

Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Platinumlist",
      "avatar": {
        "src": "https://platinumlist.net/img/empty.gif",
        "width": 1,
        "height": 1
      },
      "is_blocked": false
    }
  ]
}

  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

PartnerCompany List
GET/partner-companies?{scope,search,partner_company_id}

Valid scopes:

  • print.badges

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-H "Cache-Control: no-cache" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/partner-companies?scope=print.badges"

Response

{
  "data": [
      {
        "id": 3,
        "avatar":  {
          "src": "https://platinumlist.lc/upload/partnercompany/3-placeimg_400_200_animals-0.jpg",
          "width": 960,
          "height": 361
        },
        "name": "Platinumlist",
        "is_blocked": false
      },
      ...
  ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

search
string (optional) 

query string to search partner company by name

partner_company_id
number|array[number] (optional) 

filter partner company by id

is_blocked (number, optional) - filter partner company by is_blocked
string (required)

  "type": "object",
  "properties": {}
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Partner company not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

    "id": 3,

      "width": 960,
      "height": 361
    },

    "is_blocked": false

Upsell product list
GET/upsell-products?{scope,id}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.order-upsell

  • use.order-upsells

Available resource includes:

  • references

  • event

  • upsell_questions

  • upsell_items

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/upsell-products?scope=use.order-upsells&id=1,2&include=references"

Response

{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "quota": 1,
            "quota_type": "per item",
            "product_name": "T-shirt",
            "is_enabled": true,
            "references": {
                "event": 667
            }
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "quota": 1,
            "quota_type": "per item",
            "product_name": "Upsell test name",
            "is_enabled": true,
            "references": {
                "event": 667
            }
        }
    ]
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
scope
string (required) 

valid scope

id
number|array[number] (required) 

upsell product ids

Upsell product ¶

GET https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/upsell-products/id?scope
Responses200400404
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "quota": "10",
    "quota_type": "per item",
    "product_name": "T",
    "is_enabled": true
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of upsell product"
        },
        "quota": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "the amount that a user buy for an order (per order) or one ticket (per item), if null then infinite"
        },
        "quota_type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "per item",
            "per order"
          ],
          "description": "default per item"
        },
        "product_name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "shirt (string, required)"
        },
        "is_enabled": {
          "type": "boolean"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "quota",
        "quota_type",
        "is_enabled"
      ]
    }
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid scope provides",
    "code": "105"
  }
}
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Upsell product is not found",
    "code": "103"
  }
}

"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/upsell-products/1?scope=use.order-upsells&include=references"

{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "quota": 1,
        "quota_type": "per item",
        "product_name": "T-shirt",
        "is_enabled": true,
        "references": {
            "event": 667

Content-Type: application/json
Body

  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "ident": "12345",
    "price": 1000,
    "is_used": true,
    "usage_updated": 1445507578
  }
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of order upsell"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "67890123456 (string, required)"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "usage_updated": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "timestamp of last usage change"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "price",
        "is_used",
        "usage_updated"
      ]
    }
  }

  "error": {
    "message": "Invalid upsell status for current operation",
    "code": "107"

Order upsell
GET/order-upsells/{id}?{scope}

  • print.order-upsells

  • use.order-upsells

  • references

  • upsell_item

  • order

  • order_upsell_question_answer

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/order-upsells/1?scope=use.order-upsells&include=references"

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "ident": "659-27465625894912043",
        "price": 10,
        "is_used": false,
        "usage_updated": null,
        "references": {
            "order": 659,
            "upsell_item": 8
        }
    }
}

string (required) 

valid scope

int (required)

Modify Order upsell ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/order-upsells/id
RequestsValidateDevalidate
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "scope": "use.order-upsells",
  "operation": "validate",
  "event_session.id": 33,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "scope": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid scope"
    },
    "operation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "valid operation"
    },
    "event_session.id": {
      "type": "number",
      "description": "valid event session id"
    },
    "collector_alias": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "collector alias"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "scope",
    "operation",
    "event_session.id"
  ]
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "ident": "12345",
    "price": 1000,
    "is_used": true,
    "usage_updated": 1445507578
  },
  "meta": {
    "status": "success"
  }
}

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "unique identifier of order upsell"
        },
        "ident": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "67890123456 (string, required)"
        },
        "price": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "float price"
        },
        "is_used": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },

          "type": "number",

        "is_used",
        "usage_updated"
      ]

            "failed",
            "error"

      ]

Modify Order upsell
PATCH/order-upsells/{id}

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.order-upsell

  • use.order-upsells

Validate ¶

Validate order upsell and mark it as used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.order-upsells

  • operation string (required) - validate

  • event_session.id number (required) - 33

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

Example ¶

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "use.order-upsells",
  "operation": "validate",
  "event_session.id": 33,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/order-upsells/7

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 7,
        "ident": "661-27465625894912052",
        "price": 10,
        "is_used": true,
        "usage_updated": 1638366701
    },
    "meta": {
        "status": "success"
    }
}

Devalidate ¶

Validate order upsell and mark it as not used

Body parameters:

  • scope string (required) - use.order-upsells

  • operation string (required) - validate

  • event_session.id number (required) - 33

  • collector_alias string (optional, default ``) - collector alias

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "scope": "use.order-upsells",
  "operation": "devalidate",
  "event_session.id": 33,
  "collector_alias": "Bob"
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/order-upsells/7

Response

{
    "data": {
        "id": 7,
        "ident": "661-27465625894912052",
        "price": 10,
        "is_used": false,
        "usage_updated": 1638366701
    },
    "meta": {
        "status": "success"
    }
}
URI Parameters
HideShow
id
int (required) 

order upsell id

Batch modify order upsells ¶

PATCH https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/order-upsells
Requestsexample 1
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "transactional": false,
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "use.order-upsells",
      "operation": "validate",
      "event_session.id": 33,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "id": 1
    },
    {
      "scope": "use.order-upsells",
      "operation": "devalidate",
      "event_session.id": 33,
      "collector_alias": null,
      "id": 2
    }
  ]
}
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "transactional": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "default `false`"
    },
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}
Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
[
  {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
      "id": 1,
      "ident": "124345",
      "is_used": true,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "usage_updated": 1234567
    }
  },
  {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "Order upsell not found"
  }
]
Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "array"
}

Batch modify order upsells
PATCH/order-upsells

Valid scopes:

  • partner-sale.order-upsell

  • use.order-upsells

Body parameters:

  • transactional bool (optional, default false) - determine how operations will be processed:

    • true - if any operation generates an error then all operations are not processed
    • false - each operation is processed separately

  • data array (required) - array of patch operations. Each item contains the same parameters that are used in the patching of a single order upsell plus you must pass id of order upsell

Example ¶

Request

curl -X PATCH \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
-d '{
  "transactional":true,
  "data": [
    {
      "scope": "use.order-upsells",
      "operation": "validate",
      "event_session.id": 33,
      "collector_alias": null,
      "id": 262535
    },
    {
      "scope": "use.order-upsells",
      "operation": "devalidate",
      "event_session.id": 33,
      "collector_alias": "Bob",
      "id": 262536
    }
  ]
}' \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/order-upsells"

Response

[
    {
        "status": "failed",
        "message": "Upsell is already reactivated",
        "data": {
            "id": 5,
            "ident": "661-27465625894912050",
            "price": 10,
            "is_used": false,
            "usage_updated": 1638368257
        }
    },
    {
        "status": "success",
        "data": {
            "id": 6,
            "ident": "661-27465625894912051",
            "price": 10,
            "is_used": true,
            "usage_updated": 1638368276
        }
    }
]

Reporting ¶

Responses200
Headers
Content-Type: application/json
Body
{
  "data": [
    {
      "order_id": 1,
      "user_name": "Petya",
      "order_status": "completed",

      "event_show_date": "2022",
      "order_vat": 5,
      "order_promo_code": "Petya",
      "order_scope": "site",

      "card_type": "visa",
      "card_country": "Saudi Arabia",

      "order_comment": "Hello",

      "order_exchanged_to": 23,

      "actual_amount": 25,
      "differ_amount": 0,

Order
GET/reporting/events/{id}/orders?{scope,order_last_operation_date_from,order_last_operation_date_to,order_status}

Valid scopes:

  • reporting.event

Available resource includes:

  • customer_fields

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/reporting/events/667/orders?scope=reporting.event&include=customer_fields"

Response

            "order_id": 657,

  "data": [

Schema
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "data": {
      "type": "array"
    }
  }
}

Organiser ticket
GET/reporting/tickets?{scope,order_last_operation_date_from,order_last_operation_date_to,order_status,user_email}

Valid scopes:

  • reporting.event

Available resource includes:

  • customer_fields

Example ¶

Request

curl -X GET \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS TOKEN}" \
"https://api.platinumlist.net/v/7/reporting/tickets?scope=reporting.event&include=customer_fields"

string (optional)
